name: Awakened Shrub

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: If the shrub is motionless at the start of combat, it has Advantage on its Initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the shrub move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the shrub is animate.

actions.name: Rake
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +1, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 1 Slashing damage.

description: An awakened shrub is a Small plant that has been imbued with sentience and the ability to move. It can understand one language but can barely communicate.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.description: The claw is immune to effects that turn undead.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 2 Necrotic damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The beetle sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +1, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Fire damage.

name: Homunculus
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.description: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other. If the homunculus dies, its master takes 2d10 Psychic damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 1 Piercing damage, and the target is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition until the end of the homunculus's next turn. *Failure by 5 or More:* The target has the Poisoned condition for 1 minute. While Poisoned, the target has the Unconscious condition, which ends early if the target takes any damage.

description: A homunculus is a tiny construct servant created by a spellcaster to serve as a spy and messenger.

name: Larva
languages: Understands Common plus one other language but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +1, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) Necrotic damage.

description: Larvae have disjointed, painful memories of their past lives. Most desperately avoid other creatures. Souls condemned to the Lower Planes often become larvae--repulsive, maggot-like creatures.

traits.name: Hellish Restoration
traits.description: If the lemure dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a *Bless* spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

actions.name: Vile Slime
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +2, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

name: Myconid Sprout

traits.name: Distress Spores
traits.description: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

traits.name: Sun Sickness
traits.description: While in sunlight, the myconid has Disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +1, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 1 (1d4 - 1) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

actions.name: Rapport Spores
actions.description: The myconid expels spores in a 30-foot Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area with an Intelligence score of 2 or higher that aren't Constructs, Elementals, or Undead gain telepathy with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour.

description: Myconid sprouts are young fungal creatures that live in subterranean communities. Though small and fragile, they possess the myconid ability to communicate through spores.

actions.name: None
actions.description: No actions.

reactions.name: Shriek
reactions.description: *Trigger:* A creature or a source of Bright Light moves within 30 feet of the shrieker. *Response:* The shrieker emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of itself for 1 minute or until the shrieker dies.

name: Flumph

traits.name: Advanced Telepathy
traits.description: The flumph perceives the content of any telepathic communication within 60 feet of it.

traits.name: Prone Deficiency
traits.description: If the flumph receives the Prone condition, roll a die. On an odd number, it has the Incapacitated condition. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph makes a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, ending the Incapacitated condition on a success.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.description: The flumph's thoughts can't be read by any means, and magic can't detect its location or observe it remotely.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 feet. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Acid damage.

actions.name: Stench Spray
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 10, one creature the flumph can see within 15 feet. *Failure:* The target is coated in a foul-smelling liquid, exudes a stench for 1d4 hours, and has the Poisoned condition while the stench lasts. Other creatures have the Poisoned condition while in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the coated target. The target can remove the stench on itself if it bathes during a Short or Long Rest.

description: Bizarre Underdark creatures that are helpful to strangers, communicating telepathically and by changing color to reflect moods.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Nimble Escape
bonusActions.description: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

name: Kobold Warrior

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The kobold has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage.

description: Kobolds are small, reptilian creatures that claim descent from dragons. They lurk in dark places, setting traps and ambushes for the unwary.

name: Manes

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (2d4) Slashing damage.

description: The lowest form of demons, manes appear when truly loathsome souls are condemned to the Abyss. These misshapen demons have distorted features and bodies that crawl with Abyssal parasites.

name: Merfolk Skirmisher

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Ocean Spear
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +2, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 3 (1d6) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage. If the target is a creature, its Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of its next turn. *Hit or Miss:* The spear magically returns to the merfolk's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

description: Merfolk are aquatic humanoids found in oceans, seas, and freshwater lakes. They are curious and territorial guardians of underwater realms.

name: Modron Monodrone

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.description: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.description: If the monodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Gear
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Force damage.

actions.name: Gear Flinger
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Force damage.

description: Monodrones are the lowest-ranking modrons, spherical constructs that carry out simple tasks in Mechanus.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge can't make Proboscis attacks, and the target takes 5 (2d4) Necrotic damage at the start of each of the stirge's turns.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The blight has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the blight's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

name: Aarakocra Skirmisher

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage, or 9 (3d4 + 2) Slashing damage if the aarakocra moved 30+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.

actions.name: Wind Javelin
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Thunder damage. *Hit or Miss:* The javelin magically returns to the aarakocra's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

description: Winged Guardians of the Sky. Aarakocra skirmishers are adept at fighting aerial foes amid the clouds.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The broom doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.description: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

actions.name: Slash
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.description: The dog has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: The dog teleports up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

name: Bullywug Warrior

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.description: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

actions.name: Insectile Rapier
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

description: Bullywugs are frog-headed folk that dwell in swamps and marshes. They are fiercely territorial and attack trespassers on sight.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The bullywug jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Fetid Cloud
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the dretch. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, the creature can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both, and it can't take Reactions.

name: Drow

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: The drow has Advantage on saving throws against the Charmed condition, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the drow has Disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range 30/120 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

description: Drow are dark elves who dwell in the Underdark. They are skilled warriors and often worship Lolth, the Spider Queen.

name: Goblin Warrior

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.description: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a Bonus Action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage, plus 2 (1d4) Slashing damage if the attack roll had Advantage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 80/320 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage, plus 2 (1d4) Piercing damage if the attack roll had Advantage.

description: Goblins are small, black-hearted fey that lair in despoiled dungeons and other dismal settings. Individually weak, goblins gather in large numbers to torment other creatures.

bonusActions.name: Nimble Escape
bonusActions.description: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

name: Grimlock

traits.name: Blind Senses
traits.description: The grimlock can't use its Blindsight while Deafened and unable to smell.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.description: The grimlock has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Bone Cudgel
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Psychic damage.

description: Grimlocks are blind, cave-dwelling humanoids that hunt by sound and smell in the Underdark.

name: Kenku

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.description: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Shadow Blade
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Necrotic damage. *Hit or Miss:* The blade magically returns to the kenku's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

description: Kenku are raven-like humanoids known for their uncanny ability to mimic sounds and voices.

bonusActions.name: Eldritch Lantern
bonusActions.description: The kenku casts *Faerie Fire*, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 10).

name: Kuo-toa

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Otherworldly Perception
traits.description: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is Invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

traits.name: Slippery
traits.description: The kuo-toa has Advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a Grapple.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Sticky Net
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 10, one Large or smaller creature the kuo-toa can see within 15 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Restrained condition until the net is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage). A creature can take an action to make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check to free itself or another creature in a net within 5 feet, destroying the net on a success.

reactions.name: Sticky Shield
reactions.description: When a creature misses the kuo-toa with a melee weapon attack, the kuo-toa uses its sticky shield to catch the weapon. The attacker must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw, or the weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. A creature can use an action to try a DC 11 Strength check to pull the weapon free.

description: Kuo-toa are fish-like Underdark dwellers that worship strange deities of their own fevered imagining.

name: Modron Duodrone

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.description: The duodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.description: If the duodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The modron makes two Clockwork Blade attacks.

actions.name: Clockwork Blade
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Force damage. *Hit or Miss:* The blade magically returns to the modron's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

description: Duodrones are two-armed modrons that can carry out two tasks simultaneously.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: The mephit explodes when it dies. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the mephit. Failure: The target has the Restrained condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Mud Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 11, one creature the mephit can see within 15 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Restrained condition until the end of the mephit's next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (2d4 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Needles
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, range 30/60 ft. *Hit:* 6 (2d4 + 1) Piercing damage.

name: Pixie

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The pixie has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Faerie Dust
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack:* +4, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 1 Radiant damage, and the target has the Charmed or Poisoned condition (pixie's choice) until the start of the pixie's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The pixie casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):

description: Friends of the Forest. Pixies spend their days frolicking and exploring.

name: Pseudodragon
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The pseudodragon has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The pseudodragon makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12, one creature the pseudodragon can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* 5 (2d4) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. *Failure by 5 or More:* The Poisoned target also has the Unconscious condition until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it awake.

name: Skeleton
languages: understands languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 80/320 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: The mephit explodes when it dies. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the mephit. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Cinder Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 11, one creature the mephit can see within 15 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Blinded condition until the end of the mephit's next turn.

actions.name: Needle Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Enchanting Bow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, range 40/160 ft. *Hit:* 1 Piercing damage, and the target has the Charmed condition until the start of the sprite's next turn.

actions.name: Heart Sight
actions.description: *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 10, one creature within 5 feet the sprite can see (Celestials, Fiends, and Undead automatically fail the save). *Failure:* The sprite knows the target's emotions and alignment.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: The sprite casts *Invisibility* on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

name: Steam Mephit

traits.name: Blurred Form
traits.description: Attack rolls against the mephit are made with Disadvantage unless it has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: DC 10 DEX save in 5-foot Emanation. Failure: 5 (2d4) Fire damage. Success: Half.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 2 (1d4) Slashing plus 2 (1d4) Fire damage.

actions.name: Steam Breath
actions.description: DC 10 CON save in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 5 (2d4) Fire damage, Speed -10 ft. Success: Half damage only. Underwater doesn't grant Resistance.

description: Steam mephits are arrogant beings made of heat and vaporous water.

name: Troglodyte

traits.name: Stench
traits.description: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has Disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage.

description: Troglodytes are reptilian humanoids that dwell underground. Their horrible stench is their most notorious trait.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The fungus makes 1d4 Rotting Touch attacks.

actions.name: Rotting Touch
actions.description: Melee Attack: +2 to hit, reach 10 ft. Hit: 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

name: Winged Kobold

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The kobold has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Dragon-Tooth Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Chromatic Spittle
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 30 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) damage of a type chosen by the kobold: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison.

description: Winged kobolds are born with leathery wings, granting them the ability to fly. They serve as scouts and bombers for kobold warrens.

name: Zombie
languages: understands languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d8 + 1) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 3 (1d4 + 1) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11. *First Failure:* The target has the *Restrained* condition. The target repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. *Second Failure:* The target has the *Petrified* condition, instead of the Restrained condition, for 24 hours.

name: Darkmantle

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.description: The darkmantle can't use its Blindsight while Deafened.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the darkmantle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite.

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage, and the darkmantle attaches to the target. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the darkmantle had Advantage on the attack roll, it covers the target, which has the *Blinded* condition and is suffocating while the darkmantle is attached in this way.

actions.name: Darkness Aura
actions.description: Magical Darkness fills a 15-foot Emanation originating from the darkmantle. This effect lasts while the darkmantle maintains Concentration on it, up to 10 minutes. Darkvision can't penetrate this area, and no light can illuminate it.

description: Darkmantles are subterranean hunters that disguise themselves as stalactites. They drop on prey, smothering victims in darkness and crushing them.

name: Dust Mephit

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: The mephit explodes when it dies. DC 10 DEX save in 5-foot Emanation. Failure: 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Blinding Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 10, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has the Blinded condition until the end of the mephit's next turn.

actions.name: Sleep
actions.description: The mephit casts the *Sleep* spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 10).

description: Dust mephits are composed of air and fine earth, drawn to forsaken places.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: The gas spore bursts when it dies. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the gas spore. Failure: The target takes 10 (3d6) Poison damage and has the Poisoned condition for 1d12 hours. Unless the Poisoned condition is removed, the target dies at the end of that time and sprouts 2d4 Tiny Gas Spore Fungi (each with 1 Hit Point). After 2d6 days, they become Large and have 13 Hit Points.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +0, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 3 (1d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

name: Gnoll Warrior

traits.name: Rampage
traits.description: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a Bonus Action to move up to half its Speed and make one Bite attack.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Bone Bow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d10 + 1) Piercing damage.

description: Gnolls are hyena-headed scavengers driven by an insatiable hunger. They roam in packs, destroying everything in their path.

bonusActions.name: Rampage
bonusActions.description: Immediately after dealing damage to a creature that is already Bloodied, the gnoll moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Corrosive Form
traits.description: Nonmagical ammunition is destroyed immediately after hitting the ooze and dealing any damage. Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative -1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the ooze and coming into contact with it. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the *Mending* spell on the weapon.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d8 + 1) Acid damage. Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10. The penalty can be removed by casting the *Mending* spell on the armor.

name: Hobgoblin Warrior

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The hobgoblin has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hobgoblin's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d10 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) Poison damage.

description: Hobgoblins are fey that have a strong grasp of tactics and discipline. They form armies and wage war on their enemies.

name: Ice Mephit

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: DC 10 CON save in 5-foot Emanation. Failure: 5 (2d4) Cold damage. Success: Half.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 3 (1d4 + 1) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage.

actions.name: Fog Cloud
actions.description: The mephit casts *Fog Cloud*, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Frost Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 10, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* 7 (3d4) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

description: Ice mephits have bodies of frigid air and frozen water.

name: Jackalwere

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The jackalwere has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackalwere's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The jackalwere makes two Rend or Slam attacks.
multiattackActions: jackalwere makes two Rend or Slam

actions.name: Rend (Jackal or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Sleep Gaze
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 10, one creature the jackalwere can see within 30 feet (Constructs and Undead succeed automatically). *Failure:* The target has the Unconscious condition for 10 minutes or until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it. *Success:* The target is immune to this jackalwere's Sleep Gaze for 24 hours.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The jackalwere shape-shifts into a Medium human or a Medium jackal-humanoid hybrid, or it returns to its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

description: Indistinguishable from jackals in their natural form, jackalweres shape-shift to deceive others. These shape-shifters can take three forms: a jackal, a human, or a monstrous hybrid of the two.

name: Magma Mephit

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: DC 11 DEX save in 5-foot Emanation. Failure: 7 (2d6) Fire damage. Success: Half.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 3 (1d4 + 1) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* 7 (2d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

description: Magma mephits embody the merging of earth and fire as glowing magma.

name: Magmin

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: The magmin explodes when it dies. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the magmin. Failure: 7 (2d6) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Touch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d4 + 2) Fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

bonusActions.name: Ignited Illumination
bonusActions.description: The magmin sets itself ablaze or extinguishes its flames. While ablaze, the magmin sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

description: Reckless Elemental Arsonist. Magmins divide all things into two categories: things that are on fire and things that should be on fire.

name: Modron Tridrone

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.description: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.description: If the tridrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The modron makes three Clockwork Spear attacks.

actions.name: Clockwork Spear
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Force damage. *Hit or Miss:* The spear magically returns to the modron's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

description: Tridrones are three-armed modrons that serve as infantry and task coordinators in Mechanus.

name: Myconid Adult

traits.name: Distress Spores
traits.description: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

traits.name: Sun Sickness
traits.description: While in sunlight, the myconid has Disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +2, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d8) Bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Pacifying Spores
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11, one creature the myconid can see within 10 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Stunned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Rapport Spores
actions.description: The myconid expels spores in a 30-foot Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area with an Intelligence score of 2 or higher that aren't Constructs, Elementals, or Undead gain telepathy with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour.

description: Myconid adults are fungal creatures that live in peaceful subterranean communities. They communicate through rapport spores and defend themselves with pacifying spores.

name: Orc

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a Bonus Action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee attack with a greataxe.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Melee or ranged attack with a javelin.

bonusActions.name: Aggressive
bonusActions.description: The orc moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

description: Orcs are savage raiders and pillagers with stooped postures, low foreheads, and piggish faces with prominent lower canines that resemble tusks.

name: Piercer

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the piercer remains motionless on the ceiling, it is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The piercer can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Drop
actions.description: The piercer falls. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 11, one creature directly underneath the piercer. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Piercing damage. *Failure or Success:* The piercer reduces any damage it takes from the fall by 20.

description: Piercers are cave-dwelling monstrosities that cling to cavern ceilings, resembling stalactites. They drop on unsuspecting prey passing below.

traits.name: Iron Scent
traits.description: The rust monster can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

traits.name: Rust Metal
traits.description: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the rust monster corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the rust monster is destroyed after dealing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The rust monster makes one Bite attack and uses Antennae twice.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Antennae
actions.description: The rust monster targets one nonmagical metal object--armor or a weapon--worn or carried by a creature within 5 feet of itself. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 11, the creature with the object. *Failure:* The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the *Mending* spell on the armor or weapon.

actions.name: Destroy Metal
actions.description: The rust monster touches a nonmagical metal object within 5 feet of itself that isn't being worn or carried. The touch destroys a 1-foot Cube of the object.

reactions.name: Reflexive Antennae
reactions.description: *Trigger:* An attack roll hits the rust monster. *Response:* The rust monster uses Antennae.

name: Sahuagin Warrior

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.description: The sahuagin has Advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Hit Points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.description: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.description: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sahuagin makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

description: Sahuagin are vicious, shark-like humanoids that terrorize coastal communities and underwater civilizations.

bonusActions.name: Aquatic Charge
bonusActions.description: The sahuagin swims up to its Swim Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

name: Satyr

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The satyr has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the satyr pushes the target up to 10 feet straight away from itself.

actions.name: Mockery
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 12, one creature the satyr can see within 90 feet. *Failure:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Psychic damage.

description: Horned and Hoofed Revelers. Satyrs enjoy demonstrating their physicality through contests and defending Fey realms.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.description: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.description: While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

actions.name: Draining Swipe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score decreases by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a **Shadow** rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the shadow takes the Hide action.

name: Thug

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The thug has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The thug makes two Mace attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.description: Melee attack with a mace.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged attack with a heavy crossbow.

description: Thugs are ruthless enforcers skilled at intimidation and violence.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The limb regains 5 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the limb takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn't function on the limb's next turn. The limb dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Troll Spawn
traits.description: The limb uncannily has the same senses as a whole troll. If the limb isn't destroyed within 24 hours, roll 1d12. On a 12, the limb turns into a Troll. Otherwise, the limb withers away.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a tangle of vines.

actions.name: Constricting Vine
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 4 (1d8) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the blight can't make Constricting Vine attacks.

actions.name: Entangling Plants
actions.description: The blight casts the *Entangle* spell, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12).

name: Worg

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.description: The worg has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the start of the worg's next turn has Advantage.

description: Worgs are evil, intelligent wolves often used as mounts by goblins and other creatures of darkness. They communicate in their own language.

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.description: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a CON save against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The armor makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d10 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 20-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Sleep Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save. *Second Failure:* The target has the Unconscious condition for 1 minute. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

name: Bugbear Warrior

traits.name: Abduct
traits.description: The bugbear needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12).

actions.name: Light Hammer
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +4 (with Advantage if the target is Grappled by the bugbear), reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 9 (3d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

description: Bugbears are hulking fey born of the Feywild. Despite their formidable build, bugbears are stealthy predators that ambush their prey.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d10 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 20-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 18 (4d8) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Slowing Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target can't take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

name: Death Dog

traits.name: Two-Headed
traits.description: The dog has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Stunned, or having the Unconscious condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The death dog makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12. *First Failure:* The target has the *Poisoned* condition. While Poisoned, the target's Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and it repeats the save every 24 hours that elapse, ending the effect on itself on a success. *Subsequent Failures:* The Poisoned target's Hit Point maximum decreases by 5 (1d10).

description: Death dogs are two-headed hounds found in deserts and wastelands. Their bite carries a wasting disease that slowly saps the life from victims.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The dryad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
traits.description: The dryad can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dryad makes one Vine Lash or Thorn Burst attack, and it can use Spellcasting to cast *Charm Monster*.
multiattackActions: dryad makes one Vine Lash or Thorn Burst

actions.name: Vine Lash
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Thorn Burst
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The dryad casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):

bonusActions.name: Tree Stride
bonusActions.description: If within 5 feet of a Large or bigger tree, the dryad teleports to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second Large or bigger tree that is within 60 feet of the previous tree.

name: Empyrean Iota

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The empyrean can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The empyrean has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Otherworldly Strike
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Necrotic or Radiant damage (empyrean's choice).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The empyrean casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
**1/Day Each:** *Bless*, *Lesser Restoration* (as an action)

bonusActions.name: Healing Word
bonusActions.description: The empyrean casts *Healing Word*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Scions of the Gods. Empyrean iotas are the thoughts, memories, or indirect attentions of deities personified.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The dragon has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Superior Invisibility
traits.description: As a Bonus Action, the dragon can magically turn Invisible until its Concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Anything the dragon is wearing or carrying is Invisible with it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Euphoria Breath
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn and uses all its movement on its turn to move in a random direction.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):

bonusActions.name: Superior Invisibility
bonusActions.description: The dragon casts *Greater Invisibility* on itself, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ghoul makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature that isn't an Undead or elf, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 10. *Failure:* The target has the *Paralyzed* condition until the end of its next turn.

name: Goblin Boss

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.description: The goblin boss can take the Disengage or Hide action as a Bonus Action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The goblin makes two attacks, using Scimitar or Shortbow in any combination.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage, plus 2 (1d4) Slashing damage if the attack roll had Advantage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 80/320 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage, plus 2 (1d4) Piercing damage if the attack roll had Advantage.

reactions.name: Redirect Attack
reactions.description: When a creature the goblin boss can see targets it with an attack, the goblin boss chooses another goblin within 5 feet of itself. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.

description: Goblin bosses are the canniest and most vicious of goblins, lording their authority over their kin through cunning and cruelty.

bonusActions.name: Nimble Escape
bonusActions.description: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (2d4 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Luring Song
actions.description: The harpy sings a magical melody, which lasts until the harpy's Concentration ends on it. *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 11, each Humanoid and Giant in a 300-foot Emanation originating from the harpy when the song starts. *Failure:* The target has the *Charmed* condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. While Charmed, the target has the *Incapacitated* condition and ignores the Luring Song of other harpies. If the target is more than 5 feet from the harpy, the target moves on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the harpy. It doesn't avoid Opportunity Attacks; however, before moving into damaging terrain (such as lava or a pit) and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, the target repeats the save. *Success:* The target is immune to this harpy's Luring Song for 24 hours.

name: Hippogriff

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The hippogriff doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hippogriff makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.

description: Hippogriffs are flying creatures with the body of a horse and the head and wings of an eagle. They can be trained as mounts and are more easily domesticated than griffons.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical Darkness doesn't impede the imp's Darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The imp has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: The imp casts *Invisibility* on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Shape-Shift
actions.description: The imp shape-shifts to resemble a rat (Speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., Fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., Climb 20 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

name: Kobold Dragonshield
resistances: one type determined by its draconic ancestry (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison)

traits.name: Dragon's Resistance
traits.description: The kobold has Resistance to a type of damage based on the color of dragon that invested it with power: acid (black or copper), cold (silver or white), fire (brass, gold, or red), lightning (blue or bronze), or poison (green).

traits.name: Heart of the Dragon
traits.description: If the kobold is Frightened, it can repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns, ending the condition on a success.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The kobold has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The kobold dragonshield makes two Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee attack with a shortsword.

description: Kobold dragonshields are champions chosen by a dragon to guard the warren. They are braver and tougher than ordinary kobolds.

name: Kobold Scale Sorcerer

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The kobold has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The kobold makes two Chromatic Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Chromatic Bolt
actions.description: Melee or ranged spell attack that deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage (the kobold's choice).

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee or ranged attack with a dagger.

description: Kobold scale sorcerers have an innate talent for arcane magic, making them formidable by kobold standards.

name: Kuo-toa Whip

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Otherworldly Perception
traits.description: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is Invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

traits.name: Slippery
traits.description: The kuo-toa has Advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a Grapple.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Pincer Staff
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't make Pincer Staff attacks.

actions.name: Conjure Slimy Glob
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 9 (3d4 + 2) Acid damage.

description: Kuo-toa whips are the religious enforcers of kuo-toa communities, using divine magic to punish heretics.

bonusActions.name: Shield of Faith
bonusActions.description: The kuo-toa casts *Shield of Faith*, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ghoul makes two Icy Bite attacks.

actions.name: Icy Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Cold damage, and the target's Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the ghoul's next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature that isn't an Undead or elf, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 10. *Failure:* The target has the *Paralyzed* condition until the end of its next turn.

bonusActions.name: Watery Rush
bonusActions.description: While underwater, the ghoul moves up to half its Swim Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

name: Manes Vaporspawn

traits.name: Contortionist
traits.description: The manes can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Sickening Vapors
traits.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the manes at the end of the manes's turn. Failure: The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to this manes's Sickening Vapors for 24 hours.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) Necrotic damage.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the manes takes the Hide action.

description: Vaporspawn arise from evil souls shattered by unspeakable torments or the depredations of more powerful demons. These distorted manes undergo endless, painful contortions, and they share their torment with whatever creatures they encounter.

name: Modron Quadrone

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.description: The quadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.description: If the quadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The modron makes four Slam attacks or four Gears Launcher attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Force damage.

actions.name: Gears Launcher
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 320 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Force damage.

description: Quadrones are four-armed modrons that serve as artillery and scouts in Mechanus.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (3d6 + 1) Acid damage, and the target has Disadvantage on Intelligence saving throws until the end of the ooze's next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Crush
actions.description: *Intelligence Saving Throw:* DC 10, one creature the ooze can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 13 (3d8) Psychic damage.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

reactions.name: Mind Corrosion
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The ooze fails a saving throw against a spell or another magical effect created by a creature. *Response:* The triggering creature takes 3 (1d6) Psychic damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The quasit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the quasit's next turn.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: The quasit casts *Invisibility* on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Scare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 10, one creature within 20 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Shape-Shift
actions.description: The quasit shape-shifts to resemble a bat (Speed 10 ft., Fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., Climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., Swim 40 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the salamander's turns, each creature of the salamander's choice in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the salamander takes 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

name: Scarecrow
languages: understands languages of its creator but can't speak
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the scarecrow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary scarecrow.

actions.name: Fearsome Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (2d4 + 1) Slashing damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the end of the scarecrow's next turn.

actions.name: Terrifying Glare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 11, one creature the scarecrow can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition until the end of the scarecrow's next turn. While Frightened, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

name: Skeleton Warrior
languages: understands languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The skeleton makes two Longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage.

name: Specter
languages: understands languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The sphinx has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Radiant damage.

reactions.name: Burst of Ingenuity
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The sphinx or another creature within 30 feet makes an ability check or a saving throw. *Response:* The sphinx adds 2 to the roll.

name: Swarm of Larvae

traits.name: Swarm
traits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through an opening large enough for a Medium creature. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Necrotic damage, or 7 (2d4 + 2) Necrotic damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

description: Lone larvae pose little threat, but in large numbers, larvae can overwhelm vulnerable creatures. Out of desperation, larvae band together in grotesque swarms.

name: Thri-kreen Marauder

traits.name: Chameleon Carapace
traits.description: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. It has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.description: The thri-kreen's Long Jump is up to 30 feet and its High Jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The thri-kreen makes two attacks, using Gythka or Chatkcha in any combination.

actions.name: Gythka
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d8 + 1) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

actions.name: Chatkcha
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage.

description: Thri-kreen are insectoid humanoids that roam deserts and savannas, communicating through telepathy and clicking sounds.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The thri-kreen jumps up to 15 feet by spending 5 feet of movement.

name: Yuan-ti Infiltrator

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yuan-ti makes two Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Poison Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The yuan-ti casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
**At Will:** *Animal Friendship* (snakes only)
**2/Day:** *Suggestion*

bonusActions.name: Change Shape
bonusActions.description: The yuan-ti magically shape-shifts into a Medium snake or back to its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

description: Yuan-ti are serpentine humanoids that seek to rule the world through infiltration and manipulation.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the rug remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal rug.

traits.name: Damage Transfer
traits.description: While it is grappling a creature, the rug takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature grappled by the rug takes the other half.

actions.name: Smother
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the rug can give it the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, is suffocating, and takes 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The rug can smother only one creature at a time.

name: Ankheg

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.description: The ankheg can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5 (with Advantage if the target is Grappled by the ankheg), reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the *Grappled* condition (escape DC 13).

actions.name: Acid Spray
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

description: Ankhegs are burrowing predators that lurk beneath the surface, erupting to snatch prey with their mandibles and dissolve it with acid.

name: Awakened Tree

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: If the tree is motionless at the start of combat, it has Advantage on its Initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the tree move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the tree is animate.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

description: An awakened tree is a Huge tree imbued with sentience and mobility. Though slow-moving, its crushing blows are devastating, and it can pass for an ordinary tree when motionless.

name: Azer Sentinel

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the azer's turns, each creature of the azer's choice in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the azer takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage unless the azer has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The azer sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Burning Hammer
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

description: Fiery Smiths of Living Metal. Azer sentinels defend their communities' smiths and channel their flames through their weapons.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 15-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 22 (5d8) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 40-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 16 (3d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Repulsion Breath
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the dragon and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d10 + 3) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The bulette jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

name: Carrion Crawler

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The carrion crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The carrion crawler uses Paralyzing Tentacles and makes one Bite attack.
multiattackActions: carrion crawler uses Paralyzing Tentacles and makes one Bite

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d4 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 12, one creature the carrion crawler can see within 10 feet. *Failure:* The target has the *Poisoned* condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the *Paralyzed* condition.

description: Carrion crawlers are scavengers that consume corpses and are drawn to the scent of decay. Their tentacles exude a paralyzing toxin.

name: Centaur Trooper

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The centaur makes two attacks, using Pike or Longbow in any combination.

actions.name: Pike
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Trampling Charge
bonusActions.description: The centaur moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and can move through the spaces of Medium or smaller creatures. Each creature whose space the centaur enters is targeted once by the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 14. Failure: 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Prone condition.

description: Defenders of the Feywild. Centaur troopers are knight-like guardians.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.description: While in contact with a web, the ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ettercap makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage, and the target has the *Poisoned* condition until the start of the ettercap's next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Web Strand
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 12, one Large or smaller creature the ettercap can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* The target has the *Restrained* condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).

bonusActions.name: Reel
bonusActions.description: The ettercap pulls one creature within 30 feet of itself that is Restrained by its Web Strand up to 25 feet straight toward itself.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The dragon has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d4 + 5) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Euphoria Breath
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Incapacitated, the target uses all its movement on each of its turns to move in a random direction.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

bonusActions.name: Superior Invisibility
bonusActions.description: The dragon casts Greater Invisibility on itself, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

name: Gargoyle
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The gargoyle doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The gargoyle makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Ooze Cube
traits.description: The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.

traits.name: Transparent
traits.description: Even when the cube is in plain sight, it takes a successful DC 15 WIS (Perception) check to spot a cube that has neither moved nor attacked.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (3d6 + 2) Acid damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: The cube moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. The cube can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures if it has room inside itself to contain them (see the Ooze Cube trait). *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature whose space the cube enters for the first time during this move. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Acid damage, and the target is engulfed. An engulfed target is suffocating, can't cast spells with a Verbal component, has the Restrained condition, and takes 10 (3d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed target moves with it. An engulfed target can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) check. On a successful check, the target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space. *Success:* Half damage, and the target moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the cube. If there is no unoccupied space, the target fails the save instead.

traits.name: Stench
traits.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 ft of the ghast must succeed on a DC 10 CON save or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Turning Defiance
traits.description: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 ft have advantage on saves against Turn Undead.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a non-Undead creature, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 10. *Failure:* The target has the *Paralyzed* condition until the end of its next turn.

name: Gibbering Mouther

traits.name: Aberrant Ground
traits.description: The ground in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the mouther is Difficult Terrain.

traits.name: Gibbering
