traits.description: The mouther babbles incoherently while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 10, any creature that starts its turn within 20 feet. Failure: Roll 1d8: 1-4 does nothing, 5-6 moves randomly, 7-8 attacks randomly.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (2d6) Piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Blinding Spittle
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere within 30 feet. Failure: 7 (2d6) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the end of the mouther's next turn.

description: Amorphous heaps roiling with eyes, teeth, and strange organs that exist only to feed and to unleash their disdain for reality.

name: Githzerai Monk

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no Shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The githzerai makes two Psi Strike attacks.

actions.name: Psi Strike
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

description: Githzerai monks are ascetic warriors who dwell in the plane of Limbo, using mental discipline to shape reality.

bonusActions.name: Psi-Powered Leap
bonusActions.description: The githzerai casts *Jump*, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

reactions.name: Psionic Defense
reactions.description: The githzerai casts *Feather Fall* or *Shield* in response to the spell's trigger, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

name: Gnoll Pack Lord

traits.name: Rampage
traits.description: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a Bonus Action to move up to half its Speed and make one Bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The gnoll makes two attacks, using Bone Whip or Bone Javelin in any combination, and it uses Incite Rampage if available.

actions.name: Bone Whip
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 8 (2d4 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Bone Javelin
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Incite Rampage
actions.description: The gnoll targets another creature it can see within 60 feet of itself that has the Rampage Bonus Action. The target can take a Reaction to make one melee attack.

bonusActions.name: Rampage
bonusActions.description: Immediately after dealing damage to a creature that is already Bloodied, the gnoll moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Bone Whip attack.

description: Pack lords are the strongest gnolls in a war band, leading their fellows through ferocity and intimidation.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d10 + 2) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* 21 (6d6) Poison damage. *Success:* Half damage.

name: Grick
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.description: The grick has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The grick makes one Beak attack and one Tentacles attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d10 + 2) Slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the *Grappled* condition (escape DC 12) from all four tentacles.

description: Gricks are worm-like predators with beaks and tentacles that lurk in caverns and ruins, ambushing prey from rocky hiding spots.

name: Griffon

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The griffon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the *Grappled* condition (escape DC 14) from both of the griffon's front claws.

description: Griffons are powerful predators with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle. They nest in high mountains and prey on horses and other large creatures.

name: Intellect Devourer
languages: Understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Detect Intelligence
traits.description: The intellect devourer senses any creature within 300 feet with INT 3+, regardless of barriers.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The intellect devourer makes one Claw attack and uses Devour Intellect.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Devour Intellect
actions.description: *Intelligence Saving Throw:* DC 12, one creature the intellect devourer can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* 11 (2d10) Psychic damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the end of the intellect devourer's next turn.

actions.name: Steal Body
actions.description: *Intelligence Saving Throw:* DC 12, one Small or Medium creature within 5 feet that has the Incapacitated condition, is a Humanoid or Beast, and has 10 Hit Points or fewer. *Failure:* The intellect devourer possesses the target, consumes its brain, and teleports inside its skull. While there, the intellect devourer has Total Cover against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The intellect devourer retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; its understanding of Deep Speech; its telepathy; and its Detect Intelligence trait. It otherwise adopts the target's game statistics. It knows everything the target knew, including spells and languages.

description: Intellect devourers serve mind flayer creators by consuming brains and puppetizing mindless bodies.

name: Lizardfolk Geomancer

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The lizardfolk makes two Earth Burst attacks.

actions.name: Earth Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hail of Stone
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point the lizardfolk can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 15 (6d4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Prone condition. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The lizardfolk casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
**At Will:** *Elementalism*
**1/Day Each:** *Meld into Stone*, *Speak with Plants*, *Spike Growth*

description: Lizardfolk are reptilian humanoids that inhabit swamps, marshes, and jungles. They are pragmatic survivors with little understanding of civilized concepts.

name: Lizardfolk Shaman

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Quarterstaff.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

description: Lizardfolk shamans are the spiritual leaders of their tribes, calling upon primal magic to protect their people.

name: Merrow

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The merrow can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The merrow makes two attacks, using Bite, Claw, or Harpoon in any combination.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of the merrow's next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the merrow pulls the target up to 15 feet straight toward itself.

description: Merrow are aquatic monstrosities that dwell in coastal shallows and underwater caves. They prey on anyone unfortunate enough to enter their domain.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
traits.description: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have Disadvantage.

traits.name: Grappler
traits.description: The mimic has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

traits.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
traits.description: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5 (with Advantage if the target is Grappled by the mimic), reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage--or 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage if the target is Grappled by the mimic--plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have Disadvantage.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The mimic shape-shifts to resemble a Medium or Small object while retaining its game statistics, or it returns to its true blob form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

name: Minotaur

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.description: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.description: At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain Advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have Advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The minotaur makes one Gore attack and one Slam attack.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the minotaur moved 20 or more feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

description: Minotaurs are bull-headed monstrosities that dwell in labyrinthine lairs. They are savage combatants driven by bloodlust and a love of the hunt.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the skeleton moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

name: Modron Pentadrone

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.description: The pentadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.description: If the pentadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The modron makes five Slam attacks or five Electrical Discharge attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Force damage.

actions.name: Electrical Discharge
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Paralysis Gas
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has the Paralyzed condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

description: Pentadrones are five-armed modrons that serve as law enforcement and field commanders in Mechanus.

name: Myconid Sovereign

traits.name: Distress Spores
traits.description: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

traits.name: Sun Sickness
traits.description: While in sunlight, the myconid has Disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The myconid makes one Slam attack and uses Pacifying Spores.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (2d4 + 1) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.

actions.name: Animating Spores
actions.description: The myconid releases spores at a Medium or Small corpse within 5 feet of it that wasn't a Construct or an Undead. In 24 hours, the corpse rises as a **Myconid Spore Servant**. The corpse stays animate for 1d4 + 1 weeks or until destroyed, and it can't be animated again in this way.

actions.name: Pacifying Spores
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12, one creature the myconid can see within 10 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Stunned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Rapport Spores
actions.description: The myconid expels spores in a 30-foot Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area with an Intelligence score of 2 or higher that aren't Constructs, Elementals, or Undead gain telepathy with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour.

description: A myconid sovereign is the leader of a myconid colony, larger and wiser than its fellows. It can animate corpses with its spores and commands the respect of all myconids in its community.

name: Nothic

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.description: The nothic has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Weird Insight
traits.description: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet. The target must contest its Charisma (Deception) check against the nothic's Wisdom (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The nothic makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Rotting Gaze
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature the nothic can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 17 (5d6) Necrotic damage. *Success:* Half damage.

bonusActions.name: Weird Insight
bonusActions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature within 120 feet. Failure: The nothic magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

description: Cursed lore seekers transformed by secrets never meant to be known, with bodies warped into otherworldly shapes.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Split
traits.description: When subjected to lightning or slashing damage, the jelly splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 HP. Each new jelly has HP equal to half the original, rounded down.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (3d6 + 2) Acid damage.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.description: *Trigger:* While the jelly is Large or Medium and has 10+ Hit Points, it becomes Bloodied or is subjected to Lightning or Slashing damage. *Response:* The jelly splits into two new **Ochre Jellies**. Each new jelly is one size smaller than the original jelly and acts on its Initiative. The original jelly's Hit Points are divided evenly between the new jellies (round down).

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

name: Ogre Zombie
languages: understands Common and Giant but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 HP, it makes a CON save (DC 5 + damage taken), unless radiant or a critical hit. On a success, it drops to 1 HP instead.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

name: Orc Eye of Gruumsh

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a Bonus Action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Gruumsh's Fury
traits.description: The orc deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: Melee or ranged attack with a spear. Damage includes Gruumsh's Fury.

bonusActions.name: Aggressive
bonusActions.description: The orc moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

description: Orc eyes of Gruumsh are the religious leaders of orc tribes, serving as conduits for the One-Eyed God's will.

name: Pegasus
languages: Understands Celestial, Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Radiant damage.

description: Elusive Winged Steed. Winged, sapient horses of noble bearing.

name: Peryton
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The peryton doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The peryton makes one Gore attack and one Talons attack.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the peryton moved 30+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage. If the attack reduces a Humanoid target to 0 Hit Points, the peryton kills the target by removing its heart.

description: Perytons are monstrous predators with the body of an eagle and the head of a fanged stag. They hunt humanoids to tear out their hearts.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The poltergeist can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The poltergeist makes one Object Slam attack and uses Telekinetic Thrust.

actions.name: Object Slam
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Telekinetic Thrust
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 12, one creature the poltergeist can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Force damage, and the target is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the poltergeist.

bonusActions.name: Vanish
bonusActions.description: The poltergeist gives itself the Invisible condition or ends that condition on itself.

name: Quaggoth

traits.name: Bloodied Fury
traits.description: While Bloodied, the quaggoth has Advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The quaggoth makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage, or 13 (3d6 + 3) Slashing damage if the quaggoth is Bloodied.

description: Quaggoths are hulking, apelike humanoids that inhabit the depths of the Underdark, driven to frenzy when wounded.

name: Sahuagin Priest

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.description: The sahuagin has Advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Hit Points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.description: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.description: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sahuagin makes two Spectral Jaws attacks.

actions.name: Spectral Jaws
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The sahuagin casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
**At Will:** *Thaumaturgy*
**2/Day Each:** *Hold Person*, *Tongues*

description: Sahuagin priestesses serve as the spiritual leaders of sahuagin communities, channeling divine power from their shark god.

bonusActions.name: Fiendish Aid
bonusActions.description: The sahuagin casts *Bless* or *Healing Word*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The hag can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Coven Magic
traits.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 11): *Augury*, *Find Familiar*, *Identify*, *Locate Object*, *Scrying*, or *Unseen Servant*. The hag must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

traits.name: Vile Appearance
traits.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 11, any Beast or Humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see the hag's true form. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition until the start of its next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this hag's Vile Appearance for 24 hours.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Death Glare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 11, one Frightened creature the hag can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes 13 (3d8) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Illusory Appearance
actions.description: The hag casts *Disguise Self*, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13). The spell's duration is 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* 18 (4d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *First Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save. *Second Failure:* The target has the Paralyzed condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

name: Spined Devil

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The devil doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes two attacks, using Infernal Fork and Tail Spine in any combination.

actions.name: Infernal Fork
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Tail Spine
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range 20/80 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

description: Spined devils, also known as spinagons, lurk in the shadows of the Lower Planes, seeking secrets for their infernal lords. They prefer to attack from the air, flinging wicked barbs while staying out of reach of foes.

name: Wererat
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The wererat has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The wererat makes two attacks, using Scratch or Hand Crossbow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11. *Failure:* The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a **Wererat** under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. *Success:* The target is immune to this wererat's curse for 24 hours.

actions.name: Scratch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The wererat shape-shifts into a Medium rat-humanoid hybrid or Small rat, or returns to humanoid form.

description: Wererats shape-shift from humanoid forms into giant rats or humanoid-rat hybrids.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* 22 (5d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

traits.name: Ice Walk
traits.description: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, Difficult Terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

name: Will-o'-Wisp

traits.name: Ephemeral
traits.description: The wisp can't wear or carry anything.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The wisp sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Shock
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Lightning damage.

bonusActions.name: Consume Life
bonusActions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10, one living creature the wisp can see within 5 feet that has 0 Hit Points. Failure: The target dies, and the wisp regains 10 (3d6) Hit Points.

bonusActions.name: Vanish
bonusActions.description: The wisp and its light have the Invisible condition until the wisp's Concentration ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the wisp makes an attack roll or uses Consume Life.

description: From a distance, will-o'-wisps look like lanterns bobbing in the dark. Through the windows of abandoned structures or around the bends of treacherous paths, these spirits tempt the curious into peril. Once their prey is vulnerable, will-o'-wisps feed on the life force of those they lay low.

traits.name: Petrifying Gaze
traits.description: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk and the two of them can see each other, the basilisk can force the creature to make a DC 12 CON save if the basilisk isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature magically begins turning to stone and has the Restrained condition. It must repeat the save at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the Greater Restoration spell or other magic. A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the save at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the basilisk until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

bonusActions.name: Petrifying Gaze
bonusActions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. If the basilisk sees its reflection in the Cone, the basilisk must make this save. *First Failure:* The target has the *Restrained* condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. *Second Failure:* The target has the *Petrified* condition instead of the Restrained condition.

name: Bearded Devil
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Steadfast
traits.description: The devil can't be frightened while it can see an allied creature within 30 ft.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes one Beard attack and one Infernal Glaive attack.

actions.name: Beard
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the devil's next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can't regain Hit Points.

actions.name: Infernal Glaive
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature and doesn't already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12. *Failure:* The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses 5 (1d10) Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 21 (6d6) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

name: Bugbear Chief

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If the bugbear chief hits a creature that is Surprised, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bugbear chief makes two Morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.description: Melee attack with a morningstar.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Melee or ranged attack with a javelin.

bonusActions.name: Intimidating Presence
bonusActions.description: The bugbear chief targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the bugbear chief, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition until the end of the bugbear chief's next turn.

description: Bugbear chiefs are the biggest and most aggressive of their kind, ruling through intimidation and brute force.

traits.name: Abduct
traits.description: The bugbear needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bugbear makes two Javelin or Morningstar attacks.
multiattackActions: bugbear makes two Javelin or Morningstar

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. or range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5 (with Advantage if the target is Grappled by the bugbear), reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Quick Grapple
bonusActions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 13, one Medium or smaller creature the bugbear can see within 10 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13).

name: Displacer Beast

traits.name: Avoidance
traits.description: If the displacer beast is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Displacement
traits.description: Attack rolls against the displacer beast have Disadvantage, since it projects an illusion that makes it appear to be near its actual location. This trait is suppressed while the displacer beast has the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The displacer beast makes one Rend attack and one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 feet. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Slashing damage. If target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the *Prone* condition.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 feet. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

description: Displacer beasts are panther-like predators with six legs and two barbed tentacles. They project illusions that make them appear to be slightly offset from their true positions.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.description: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

traits.name: Read Thoughts
traits.description: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts. The target can make a DC 11 WIS save to end the effect.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The doppelganger makes two Slam attacks and uses Unsettling Visage if available.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6 (with Advantage during the first round of each combat), reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Read Thoughts
actions.description: The doppelganger casts *Detect Thoughts*, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12).

actions.name: Unsettling Visage
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the doppelganger that can see the doppelganger. *Failure:* The target has the *Frightened* condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The doppelganger shape-shifts into a Medium or Small Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

name: Flaming Skeleton
languages: Understands Common plus one other language but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The skeleton makes two attacks, using Flame Scepter or Hurl Flame in any combination.

actions.name: Flame Scepter
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d10 + 2) Fire damage.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: The skeleton explodes when it dies. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the skeleton. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The skeleton sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

name: Githyanki Warrior

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The githyanki makes two Psi Blade attacks.

actions.name: Psi Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

bonusActions.name: Misty Step
bonusActions.description: The githyanki casts *Misty Step*, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Githyanki warriors use psionic abilities to augment their battle prowess.

name: Goblin Hexer

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.description: The goblin hexer can take the Disengage or Hide action as a Bonus Action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The goblin makes two Hex Stick attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Hex Stick
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The goblin casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
**At Will:** *Minor Illusion*
**1/Day Each:** *Blindness/Deafness*, *Faerie Fire*, *Grease*

description: Goblin hexers channel fey magic to curse and befuddle their foes.

reactions.name: Jinx
reactions.description: *Trigger:* A creature the goblin can see hits it with an attack roll. *Response -- Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 13, the triggering creature. *Failure:* The attack misses instead.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* 22 (4d10) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Weakening Breath
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature that isn't currently affected by this breath in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Tests and subtracts 2 (1d4) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The hag can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Coven Magic
traits.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 11): *Augury*, *Find Familiar*, *Identify*, *Locate Object*, *Scrying*, or *Unseen Servant*. The hag must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.description: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations only with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hag makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks):

name: Grell

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The grell makes one Beak attack and one Paralyzing Tentacles attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d10 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12) from two of ten tentacles. The target is also subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

description: Silent predators that defy gravity and perceive their surroundings via sound and electrical fields.

traits.name: Abduct
traits.description: The grell needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

name: Hell Hound

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The hound has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hound makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 17 (5d6) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

description: Spawned from the pits of Acheron, Gehenna, and the Nine Hells, hell hounds enforce the merciless order of those realms and the whims of tyrannical masters.

name: Hobgoblin Captain

traits.name: Aura of Authority
traits.description: While in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the hobgoblin, the hobgoblin and its allies have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the hobgoblin doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hobgoblin makes two attacks, using Greatsword or Longbow in any combination.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.

bonusActions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
bonusActions.description: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin captain can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin captain. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin captain has the Incapacitated condition or dies.

description: Hobgoblin captains command squads of hobgoblin warriors with tactical precision.

name: Hook Horror

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.description: The hook horror can't use its Blindsight while Deafened.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.description: The hook horror has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hook horror makes two Hook attacks.

actions.name: Hook
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the hook horror moves the target 5 feet straight toward or away from itself.

description: Hook horrors are Underdark predators that resemble vultures with massive hooks in place of hands. They navigate in total darkness using echolocation.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The kuo-toa makes two Bone Whip attacks.

actions.name: Bone Whip
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Lightning damage, and the target can't make Opportunity Attacks until the start of the kuo-toa's next turn.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

traits.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
traits.description: The manticore has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the manticore finishes a Long Rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The manticore makes three attacks, using Rend or Tail Spike in any combination.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spike
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 100/200 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Abyssal Glaive
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the minotaur moved 10+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.

name: Mummy
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mummy makes two Rotting Fist attacks and uses Dreadful Glare.

actions.name: Rotting Fist
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 11, one creature the mummy can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* The target has the *Frightened* condition until the end of the mummy's next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this mummy's Dreadful Glare for 24 hours.

name: Nightmare
languages: Understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak

traits.name: Confer Fire Resistance
traits.description: The nightmare can grant Resistance to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the nightmare.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The nightmare sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Ethereal Stride
actions.description: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.

description: Nightmares resemble horses with flaming manes, burning hooves, and smoldering eyes. They terrorize weaker creatures and often ally with denizens of the Lower Planes in committing evil acts.

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.description: The owlbear has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The owlbear makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d8 + 5) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.description: The spider can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane while on the Material Plane and vice versa.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the spider knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The spider makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Poison damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the target becomes Stable, and it has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. While Poisoned, the target also has the Paralyzed condition.

bonusActions.name: Ethereal Jaunt
bonusActions.description: The spider magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The quaggoth makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The quaggoth casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
**At Will:** *Mage Hand* (the hand is Invisible), *Minor Illusion*
**2/Day:** *Mind Spike*

traits.name: Bloodied Fury
traits.description: While Bloodied, the quaggoth has Advantage on attack rolls.

reactions.name: Psionic Defense
reactions.description: The quaggoth casts *Feather Fall* or *Shield* in response to the spell's trigger, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The spectator uses Eye Rays twice.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The spectator randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 90 feet of itself (roll 1d4; reroll if the spectator has already used that ray during this turn):

reactions.name: Spell Reflection
reactions.description: If the spectator makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the spectator can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the spectator. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

actions.name: Swarm of Grasping Hands
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 20 (4d8 + 2) Necrotic damage, or 11 (2d8 + 2) Necrotic damage if the swarm is *Bloodied*. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the *Prone* condition.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The swarm makes two Vile Slime attacks.

actions.name: Vile Slime
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Poison damage, or 9 (2d6 + 2) Poison damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

traits.name: Hellish Restoration
traits.description: If the swarm dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a *Bless* spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through an opening large enough for a Small creature. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The familiar makes two Umbral Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Umbral Dagger
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) Necrotic damage. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack, the target becomes Stable but has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. While it has the Poisoned condition, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

traits.name: Vampiric Connection
traits.description: While the familiar and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the familiar telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the familiar's senses.

bonusActions.name: Deathless Agility
bonusActions.description: The familiar takes the Dash or Disengage action.

name: Water Weird

traits.name: Invisible in Water
traits.description: The water weird has the Invisible condition while fully immersed in water.

traits.name: Water Bound
traits.description: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

actions.name: Surge
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

description: Servant of Primeval Magic. Serpentine nature spirits that protect pools, fountains, and magical bodies of water.

name: Werewolf
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The werewolf has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one ally is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The werewolf makes two attacks, using Scratch or Longbow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12. *Failure:* The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a **Werewolf** under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. *Success:* The target is immune to this werewolf's curse for 24 hours.

actions.name: Scratch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The werewolf shape-shifts into a Large wolf-humanoid hybrid or Medium wolf, or returns to humanoid form.

description: Werewolves change from humanoid forms into fierce wolves or wolf-humanoid hybrids.

name: Wight
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The wight makes two attacks, using Necrotic Sword or Necrotic Bow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Life Drain.

actions.name: Necrotic Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Bow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature within 5 feet. *Failure:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

name: Winter Wolf

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The wolf has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Snow Camouflage
traits.description: The wolf has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* 18 (4d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

description: Winter wolves are intelligent pack hunters native to arctic lands. They speak Common and Giant, and they often ally with frost giants and other evil creatures.

name: Yeti

traits.name: Fear of Fire
traits.description: If the yeti takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Snow Camouflage
traits.description: The yeti has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two attacks, using Claw or Ice Throw in any combination.
multiattackActions: yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Throw
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d4 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage.

actions.name: Chilling Gaze
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature the yeti can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* 5 (2d4) Cold damage, and the target has the Paralyzed condition until the start of the yeti's next turn unless the target has Immunity to Cold damage. *Success:* The target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

description: Yetis are hulking, ape-like predators that dwell in frozen mountain caves. They can chill creatures with a look, freezing their foes in place.

name: Yuan-ti Malison

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yuan-ti makes two Bite attacks, or it makes one Bite attack and one Constrict attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target has the Restrained condition, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target.

bonusActions.name: Change Shape
bonusActions.description: The yuan-ti magically shape-shifts into a Medium snake or back to its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

description: Yuan-ti malisons are twisted half-serpent abominations that serve as the enforcers and agents of yuan-ti schemes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yuan-ti makes two attacks, using Bite or Poison Ray in any combination, and it can use Spellcasting to cast *Suggestion* if available.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Ray (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.description:
The yuan-ti casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
**At Will:** *Animal Friendship* (snakes only)
**2/Day:** *Suggestion*

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The yuan-ti shape-shifts into a Medium snake or returns to its true form. If it dies, it stays in its current form. The yuan-ti's game statistics are the same in each form, except where noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yuan-ti makes two Bite attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast *Suggestion* if available.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.description:
The yuan-ti casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
**At Will:** *Animal Friendship* (snakes only)
**2/Day:** *Suggestion*

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The yuan-ti shape-shifts into a Medium snake or returns to its true form. If it dies, it stays in its current form. The yuan-ti's game statistics are the same in each form, except where noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yuan-ti makes two Poison Burst attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast *Suggestion* if available.

actions.name: Poison Burst (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 13, one Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet. *Failure:* 21 (4d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.description:
The yuan-ti casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
**At Will:** *Animal Friendship* (snakes only)
**2/Day:** *Suggestion*

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The yuan-ti shape-shifts into a Medium snake or returns to its true form. If it dies, it stays in its current form. The yuan-ti's game statistics are the same in each form, except where noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

name: Aarakocra Aeromancer

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aarakocra makes two Wind Staff attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast *Gust of Wind*.

actions.name: Wind Staff
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The aarakocra casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
**At Will:** *Elementalism*, *Gust of Wind*, *Mage Hand*, *Message*
**1/Day:** *Lightning Bolt*

reactions.name: Feather Fall
reactions.description: The aarakocra casts *Feather Fall* in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Winged Guardians of the Sky. Aarakocra aeromancers control magical winds from the endless storms of the Elemental Plane of Air.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Detect Life
traits.description: The banshee can magically sense the presence of creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The banshee makes two Corrupting Touch attacks and uses Horrify.

actions.name: Corrupting Touch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Horrify
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature the banshee can see within 60 feet that can see the banshee. *Failure:* The target has the *Frightened* condition until the start of the banshee's next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this banshee's Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

actions.name: Deathly Wail
actions.description: The banshee releases a mournful wail if it isn't in sunlight. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature within 30 feet that can hear the wail and isn't a Construct or an Undead. *Failure:* If the target has 25 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

traits.name: Corrosive Form
traits.description: A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft takes 4 (1d8) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the pudding corrodes.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The pudding can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Split
traits.description: When subjected to lightning or slashing damage, the pudding splits into two new puddings if it has at least 10 HP.

actions.name: Dissolving Pseudopod
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 17 (4d6 + 3) Acid damage. Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10. The penalty can be removed by casting the *Mending* spell on the armor.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.description: *Trigger:* While the pudding is Large or Medium and has 10+ Hit Points, it becomes Bloodied or is subjected to Lightning or Slashing damage. *Response:* The pudding splits into two new **Black Puddings**. Each new pudding is one size smaller than the original pudding and acts on its Initiative. The original pudding's Hit Points are divided evenly between the new puddings (round down).

name: Bone Naga

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The naga makes two Bite attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of Serpentine Gaze.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Serpentine Gaze
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature the naga can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Psychic damage, and the target has the *Charmed* condition until the start of the naga's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
**At Will:** *Mage Hand*, *Thaumaturgy*
**1/Day Each:** *Command*, *Detect Thoughts*, *Lightning Bolt*

description: Bone nagas are skeletal terrors raised from the remains of magically slain nagas or nagas that were killed but that hadn't yet rejuvenated. They are granted unlife through rituals practiced by cultists, yuan-ti, and morbid spirit nagas.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.description: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bullywug makes two Bog Staff attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Ray of Sickness*.

actions.name: Bog Staff
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The bullywug casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Dancing Lights*, *Druidcraft*, *Ray of Sickness*
**1/Day Each:** *Speak with Plants*, *Vitriolic Sphere*

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The bullywug jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

name: Chuul
languages: Understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The chuul can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Sense Magic
traits.description: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of itself. This trait otherwise works like the Detect Magic spell but isn't itself magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The chuul makes two Pincer attacks and uses Paralyzing Tentacles.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of two pincers.

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature Grappled by the chuul. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

description: Chitinous servants of aboleths that snare creatures in massive pincers before rendering foes helpless with paralytic tentacles.

name: Couatl

traits.name: Shielded Mind
traits.description: The couatl's thoughts can't be read by any means, and other creatures can communicate with it telepathically only if it allows them.

atWill: Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (1d12 + 5) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of the couatl's next turn.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 15, one Medium or smaller creature the couatl can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* 8 (1d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The couatl casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*, *Detect Magic*, *Detect Thoughts*, *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Create Food and Water*, *Dream*, *Greater Restoration*, *Scrying*, *Sleep*

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The couatl casts *Bless*, *Lesser Restoration*, or *Sanctuary*, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Guardian Manifestation of the Divine. Embodiments of prophecy and protectors of divine secrets.

traits.name: Two Heads
traits.description: The ettin has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saves against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and rendered unconscious.

traits.name: Wakeful
traits.description: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ettin makes one Battleaxe attack and one Morningstar attack.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d8 + 5) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage, and the target has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The flameskull sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The flameskull has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its Hit Points in 1 hour unless Holy Water is sprinkled on its remains or the *Dispel Evil and Good* spell is cast on them.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The flameskull makes two Fire Ray attacks.

actions.name: Fire Ray
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The flameskull casts one of the following spells, requiring no Somatic or Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
**At Will:** *Mage Hand*
**2/Day:** *Magic Missile* (level 2 version)
**1/Day:** *Fireball*

name: Ghost

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.description: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ghost makes two Withering Touch attacks.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 19 (3d10 + 3) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.description: The ghost casts the *Etherealness* spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The ghost is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

actions.name: Horrific Visage
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 60-foot *Cone* that can see the ghost and isn't an Undead. *Failure:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Psychic damage, and the target has the *Frightened* condition until the start of the ghost's next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

actions.name: Possession
actions.description: *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 13, one Humanoid the ghost can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* The target is possessed by the ghost; the ghost disappears, and the target has the *Incapacitated* condition and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body, but the target retains awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that specifically target Undead. The ghost's game statistics are the same, except it uses the possessed target's Speed, as well as the target's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution modifiers.

description: Ghosts arise when living creatures die in a state of extreme emotion or having left an important task undone. These incorporeal spirits haunt locations that are meaningful to them, lingering until their business is complete or they're put to rest.

name: Gnoll Fang of Yeenoghu

traits.name: Rampage
traits.description: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a Bonus Action to move up to half its Speed and make one Bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The gnoll makes one Bite attack and two Bone Flail attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the gnoll's next turn.

actions.name: Bone Flail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

description: Gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu are possessed by demonic power, channeling the Demon Prince of Gnolls to spread carnage.

bonusActions.name: Rampage
bonusActions.description: Immediately after dealing damage to a creature that is already Bloodied, the gnoll moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Bite attack.

name: Helmed Horror
languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The helmed horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spell Immunity
traits.description: The helmed horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator (typically fireball, heat metal, and lightning bolt).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The helmed horror makes two Arcane Sword attacks.
multiattackActions: helmed horror makes two Arcane Sword

actions.name: Arcane Sword
