actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Force damage.

name: Incubus

traits.name: Succubus Form
traits.description: When the incubus finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into a Succubus, using that stat block instead of this one. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The incubus makes two Restless Touch attacks.

actions.name: Restless Touch
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) Psychic damage, and the target is cursed for 24 hours or until the incubus dies. Until the curse ends, the target gains no benefit from finishing Short Rests.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The incubus casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At Will: Disguise Self, Etherealness. 1/Day Each: Dream, Hypnotic Pattern.

bonusActions.name: Nightmare
bonusActions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the incubus can see within 60 feet. Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it has the Unconscious condition for 1 hour, until it takes damage, or until a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it. Otherwise, the target takes 18 (4d8) Psychic damage.

description: Incubi exploit the vulnerability of mortal dreams. Slipping into the homes of sleepers, incubi feed off dreams and replace them with terrifying nightmares.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shadow Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 17 (5d6) Necrotic damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies, and a Shadow rises from its corpse. The shadow is under the dragon's control and shares the dragon's Initiative count but acts immediately after the dragon.

traits.name: Living Shadow
traits.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the dragon has Resistance to damage that isn't Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the dragon has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the dragon takes the Hide action.

name: Lamia

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The lamia makes two Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Corrupting Touch.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Corrupting Touch
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature the lamia can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* 13 (3d8) Psychic damage, and the target is cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has the Charmed and Poisoned conditions.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The lamia casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

description: Lamias are vain, predatory monstrosities with the upper body of a humanoid and the lower body of a lion. They lure victims with illusions and enchantments.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The lamia jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

name: Lizardfolk Sovereign

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The lizardfolk makes one Bite attack and one Earthen Maul attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature that isn't a Construct or an Undead, the lizardfolk gains Temporary Hit Points equal to the damage dealt.

actions.name: Earthen Maul
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

bonusActions.name: Charge
bonusActions.description: The lizardfolk moves up to its Speed or Swim Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

description: Lizardfolk monarchs are the fearsome rulers of their tribes, commanding respect through raw physical prowess and force of personality.

name: Orc War Chief

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a Bonus Action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Gruumsh's Fury
traits.description: The orc deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The orc war chief makes two Greataxe attacks or two Javelin attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee attack with a greataxe. Damage includes Gruumsh's Fury.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Melee or ranged attack with a javelin. Damage includes Gruumsh's Fury.

bonusActions.name: Aggressive
bonusActions.description: The orc war chief moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

bonusActions.name: Battle Cry (1/Day)
bonusActions.description: Each creature of the war chief's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and is not already affected by Battle Cry gains Advantage on attack rolls until the start of the war chief's next turn. The war chief can then make one attack as part of this Bonus Action.

description: Orc war chiefs are the mightiest orcs in a tribe, claiming dominance through sheer strength and ferocity.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* 24 (7d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

name: Shadow Demon

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the demon dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.description: While in Bright Light, the demon has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Umbral Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) Psychic damage.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the demon takes the Hide action.

description: Shadow demons form when exceptionally wicked demons are destroyed and prevented from reconstituting their physical forms in the Abyss. They are the incorporeal remnants of destroyed demons' evil.

traits.name: Incubus Form
traits.description: When the succubus finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into an **Incubus**, using that stat block instead of this one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The succubus makes one Fiendish Touch attack and uses Charm or Draining Kiss.

actions.name: Fiendish Touch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d10 + 5) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Charm
actions.description: The succubus casts *Dominate Person* (level 8 version), requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15).

actions.name: Draining Kiss
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, one creature Charmed by the succubus within 5 feet. *Failure:* 13 (3d8) Psychic damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The succubus shape-shifts into a Medium or Small Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except its Fly Speed is available only in its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

name: Swarm of Dretches
languages: Abyssal (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The swarm makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (3d6 + 2) Slashing damage, or 9 (3d4 + 2) Slashing damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

traits.name: Fetid Aura
traits.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12, any creature that starts its turn in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the swarm. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of its next turn. While Poisoned, the target can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both, and it can't take Reactions.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small creature. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

name: Wereboar
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The wereboar can use its action to polymorph into a boar-humanoid hybrid or into a boar, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Charge (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
traits.description: If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its Tusks on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Relentless
traits.description: If the wereboar takes 14 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 Hit Points, it is reduced to 1 Hit Point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The wereboar makes two attacks, using Javelin or Tusk in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Gore attack.

actions.name: Gore (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12. *Failure:* The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a **Wereboar** under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. *Success:* The target is immune to this wereboar's curse for 24 hours.

actions.name: Javelin (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Tusk (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the wereboar moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The wereboar shape-shifts into a Medium boar-humanoid hybrid or Small boar, or returns to humanoid form.

description: Wereboars shape-shift from humanoid forms into powerful boars or humanoid-boar hybrids.

name: Weretiger
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The weretiger can use its action to polymorph into a tiger-humanoid hybrid or into a tiger, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.description: The weretiger has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pounce (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
traits.description: If the weretiger moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition. If the target has the Prone condition, the weretiger can make one Bite attack against it as a Bonus Action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The weretiger makes two attacks, using Scratch or Longbow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13. *Failure:* The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a **Weretiger** under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. *Success:* The target is immune to this weretiger's curse for 24 hours.

actions.name: Scratch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Prowl (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
bonusActions.description: The weretiger moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. At the end, it can take the Hide action.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The weretiger shape-shifts into a Large tiger-humanoid hybrid or Large tiger, or returns to humanoid form.

description: Weretigers shape-shift from humanoid forms into tigers or tiger-humanoid hybrids.

traits.name: Air Form
traits.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two Thunderous Slam attacks.

actions.name: Thunderous Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d8 + 5) Thunder damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 13, one Medium or smaller creature in the elemental's space. *Failure:* 24 (4d10 + 2) Thunder damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the elemental and has the Prone condition. *Success:* Half damage only.

name: Barbed Devil
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

traits.name: Barbed Hide
traits.description: At the start of each of its turns, the devil deals 5 (1d10) Piercing damage to any creature it is grappling or any creature grappling it.

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes one Claws attack and one Tail attack, or it makes two Hurl Flame attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from both claws.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 150 ft. *Hit:* 17 (5d6) Fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

name: Barlgura

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the barlgura dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The barlgura makes one Tormenting Bite attack and two Thrash attacks.

actions.name: Tormenting Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Thrash
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The barlgura casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13): 2/Day Each: Disguise Self, Invisibility (self only). 1/Day Each: Entangle, Phantasmal Killer (level 6 version).

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The barlgura jumps up to 40 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

description: Barlguras are demons that embody brutality and killer instincts. They ruthlessly hunt creatures that enter their territories.

name: Beholder Zombie

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The zombie uses Eye Rays twice.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 16 (4d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The zombie randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll 1d4; reroll if the zombie has already used that ray during this turn):

description: A beholder zombie is the undead husk of a beholder, animated by dark magic. Though it retains some of its eye ray abilities, it is a mindless servant.

name: Bulette

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bulette makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d12 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Deadly Leap
actions.description: The bulette spends 5 feet of movement to jump to a space within 15 feet that contains one or more Large or smaller creatures. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in the bulette's destination space. *Failure:* 19 (3d12) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the *Prone* condition. *Success:* Half damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet straight away from the bulette.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The bulette jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

description: Bulettes, also known as land sharks, are massive armored predators that burrow through earth and stone, leaping from the ground to devour prey.

name: Cambion
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Fiendish Blessing
traits.description: The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cambion makes two attacks, using Claw or Fire Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The cambion casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
**2/Day Each:** *Alter Self*, *Command* (level 3 version), *Detect Magic*
**1/Day Each:** *Dominate Person* (level 8 version), *Plane Shift* (self only)

name: Drow Elite Warrior

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: The drow has Advantage on saving throws against the Charmed condition, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the drow has Disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The drow makes two Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range 30/120 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

description: Elite drow warriors are the backbone of drow military forces, skilled in both melee and ranged combat.

name: Earth Elemental
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two attacks, using Slam or Rock Launch in any combination.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock Launch
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +8, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the elemental's turns, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the elemental takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage. Creatures and flammable objects in the Emanation start burning.

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.description: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so, and it can enter a creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The elemental sheds Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
traits.description: The elemental takes 3 (1d6) Cold damage for every 5 feet the elemental moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two Burn attacks.

actions.name: Burn
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it starts burning.

name: Flesh Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't Adamantine

traits.name: Aversion to Fire
traits.description: If the golem takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Berserk
traits.description: Whenever the golem starts its turn Bloodied, roll 1d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object. Once the golem goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The golem can't shape-shift.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The golem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The golem makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) Lightning damage.

description: Flesh golems are horrific constructs stitched together from humanoid body parts and animated through dark science and arcane power.

name: Gorgon

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d12 + 5) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the gorgon moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the *Prone* condition.

actions.name: Petrifying Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *First Failure:* The target has the *Restrained* condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. *Second Failure:* The target has the *Petrified* condition instead of the Restrained condition.

description: Gorgons are iron-clad bull-like monstrosities whose petrifying breath turns living creatures to stone. They are territorial and relentlessly aggressive.

bonusActions.name: Trample
bonusActions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature within 5 feet that has the Prone condition. *Failure:* 16 (2d10 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

name: Half-Dragon
resistances: Damage type chosen for the Draconic Origin trait below

traits.name: Draconic Origin
traits.description: The half-dragon is related to a type of dragon associated with one of the following damage types (DM's choice): Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. This choice affects other aspects of the stat block.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The half-dragon makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d4 + 4) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) damage of the type chosen for the Draconic Origin trait.

actions.name: Dragon's Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 28 (8d6) damage of the type chosen for the Draconic Origin trait. *Success:* Half damage.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The half-dragon jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

description: Born through magical rites involving the essences of dragons, half-dragons serve their creators and their own draconic whims. Most half-dragons are created by chromatic dragons who desire servants with some trace of their own might and grandeur.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Tree Club or Trash Lob in any combination.

actions.name: Tree Club
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 18 (3d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Trash Lob
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +8, range 60/240 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d10 + 5) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

name: Mezzoloth

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the mezzoloth dies outside Gehenna, it revives there instantly.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mezzoloth makes two attacks, using Claws or Mercurial Trident in any combination.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from two of four claws, and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Mercurial Trident
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Force damage. *Hit or Miss:* The trident magically returns to the mezzoloth's claw immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The mezzoloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: Teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space. Can bring one grappled creature.

description: Insectile yugoloths that seek power and souls in service of fiendish lords.

name: Night Hag
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

traits.name: Coven Magic
traits.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): *Augury*, *Find Familiar*, *Identify*, *Locate Object*, *Scrying*, or *Unseen Servant*. The hag must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The hag has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Bag
traits.description: The hag has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the hag can use its Nightmare Haunting action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hag makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day; Requires Soul Bag)
actions.description: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag casts *Dream*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the hag can serve as the spell's messenger, and the target must be a creature the hag can see on the Material Plane. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the *Protection from Evil and Good* spell or within a *Magic Circle* spell.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The hag shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

name: Otyugh

traits.name: Limited Telepathy
traits.description: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The otyugh makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition. Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15. *Failure:* The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by 5 (1d10) and doesn't return to normal until the Poisoned condition ends on the target. *Success:* The Poisoned condition ends.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from one of two tentacles.

actions.name: Tentacle Slam
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature Grappled by the otyugh. *Failure:* 16 (3d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the start of the otyugh's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

description: Otyughs live to eat -- the more disgusting the meal, the better. In dumps, sewers, and murky depths they devour garbage and anything their tentacles can reach.

name: Pixie Wonderbringer

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The pixie has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The pixie makes two Faerie Dust attacks.

actions.name: Faerie Dust
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Radiant damage, and the target has the Charmed or Poisoned condition (pixie's choice) until the start of the pixie's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The pixie casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

bonusActions.name: Burst of Wonder
bonusActions.description: The pixie casts Entangle, Polymorph, or Tasha's Hideous Laughter, requiring no Material components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Friends of the Forest. Energetic entertainers who use their magic in defense of the wilderness.

name: Red Slaad

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The slaad regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The slaad makes three Injecting Claw attacks.

actions.name: Injecting Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a slaad, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14. *Failure:* The target is cursed unawares, and a minuscule slaad egg is implanted in it. Removing the curse destroys the egg. Over 2d4  10 days, the egg gestates. In the final 24 hours, the cursed target feels unwell; its Speed is halved, and it has Disadvantage on D20 Tests. At the end of this time, the egg turns into a **Slaad Tadpole**, which chews out of the host and kills it.

description: Red slaadi are savage creatures of chaos spawned in the plane of Limbo. They implant eggs in their victims via their claws, which hatch into slaad tadpoles.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The revenant regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the revenant takes Fire or Radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Its body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the revenant dies, it revives 24 hours later in a different body unless *Dispel Evil or Good* is cast on its corpse. If it revives, it animates a Humanoid corpse elsewhere on the same plane of existence; it now looks different but uses the same stat block and returns with all its Hit Points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The revenant uses Vengeful Glare and makes two Slam attacks.
multiattackActions: revenant uses Vengeful Glare and makes two Slam

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Vengeful Glare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 15, one creature the revenant can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. If the Frightened target is cursed by the revenant (see Vow of Revenge), the target also has the Paralyzed condition for the duration.

bonusActions.name: Vow of Revenge
bonusActions.description: The revenant curses one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The revenant knows the distance to and direction of the cursed target, even if it is on a different plane of existence. The curse ends on the target if the revenant uses this Bonus Action on a different creature.

name: Roper

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

traits.name: Grasping Tendrils
traits.description: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check against it.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The roper makes two Tentacle attacks, uses Reel, and makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 17 (3d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 60 ft. *Hit:* The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of six tentacles, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Reel
actions.description: The roper pulls each creature Grappled by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

description: Ropers are Underdark ambush predators that disguise themselves as cave formations. They extend sticky tendrils to snag prey and reel it toward their toothy maws.

name: Sahuagin Baron

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.description: The sahuagin has Advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Hit Points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.description: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.description: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sahuagin makes three Trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

description: Sahuagin barons are the elite rulers of sahuagin communities, larger and more cunning than their kin.

reactions.name: Fiendish Blood
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The sahuagin takes Piercing or Slashing damage. *Response -- Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature of the sahuagin's choice in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the sahuagin. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Acid damage, and the target is cursed until it finishes a Short or Long Rest. While cursed, the target can't benefit from the Invisible condition, its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and all Fiends within 120 feet of the target can sense its location regardless of interposing obstacles.

name: Salamander

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the salamander's turns, each creature of the salamander's choice in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the salamander takes 7 (2d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The salamander makes two Flame Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Constrict.

actions.name: Flame Spear
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Fire damage. *Hit or Miss:* The spear magically returns to the salamander's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 15, one Large or smaller creature the salamander can see within 10 feet. *Failure:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Fire damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

description: Serpentine Artists of the Inferno. Salamanders are arrogant yet curious, seeking to create artful blazes.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of HP equal to the lightning damage dealt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The shambling mound makes three Charged Tendril attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Engulf.
multiattackActions: shambling mound makes three Charged Tendril

actions.name: Charged Tendril
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Lightning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the shambling mound pulls the target 5 feet straight toward itself.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 15, one Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet. *Failure:* The target is pulled into the shambling mound's space and has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, and it takes 10 (3d6) Lightning damage at the start of each of its turns. When the shambling mound moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing it no extra movement. The shambling mound can have only one creature Grappled by this action at a time.

traits.name: Loathsome Limbs (4/Day)
traits.description: If the troll ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the troll's limbs is severed, falls into the troll's space, and becomes a Troll Limb. The limb acts immediately after the troll's turn. The troll has 1 Exhaustion level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The troll regains 15 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn't function on the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The troll makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

bonusActions.name: Charge
bonusActions.description: The troll moves up to half its Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

name: Umber Hulk

traits.name: Confusing Gaze
traits.description: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk has the Incapacitated condition. On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take Reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, or it does nothing if no creature is within reach.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.description: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The umber hulk makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage.

description: Umber hulks are hulking, insectoid predators that burrow through the Underdark. Their confusing gaze bewilders prey, leaving victims helpless against their powerful mandibles.

bonusActions.name: Confusing Gaze
bonusActions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target can't take Reactions until the start of the umber hulk's next turn, and the target rolls 1d8 to determine what it does on its next turn:

name: Unicorn

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the unicorn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The unicorn has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The unicorn makes one Hooves attack and one Radiant Horn attack.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Radiant Horn
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The unicorn casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*, *Druidcraft*
**1/Day Each:** *Calm Emotions*, *Dispel Evil and Good*, *Entangle*, *Pass without Trace*, *Word of Recall*

bonusActions.name: Unicorn's Blessing
bonusActions.description: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn and casts *Cure Wounds* or *Lesser Restoration* on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Charging Horn
actions.description: The unicorn moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it makes one Radiant Horn attack.

actions.name: Shimmering Shield
actions.description: The unicorn targets itself or one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target gains 10 (3d6) Temporary Hit Points, and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the unicorn's next turn. The unicorn can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

description: Majestic and Magical Forest Master. Unicorns are majestic defenders of forests.

actions.name: Healing Mist
actions.description: The unicorn causes shimmering fey light to appear in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 120 feet. Each creature in the sphere must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The unicorn creates a shimmering field that covers a 20-foot square within 60 feet. Any spell of 4th level or lower cast from outside the field can't affect creatures or objects within it.

actions.name: Calming Aura
actions.description: The unicorn conjures a swirling mist around a creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or the unicorn teleports the target to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

effects.name: Pure Water
effects.description: Open flames of a nonmagical nature are extinguished within 1 mile of the lair. Torches and campfires refuse to burn.

effects.name: Blessed Land
effects.description: Creatures native to the lair have advantage on all Wisdom-based saving throws while within 1 mile of the lair.

effects.name: Nature's Shield
effects.description: Curses, diseases, and poison have no effect on creatures within 1 mile of the lair.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the unicorn dies, these effects end immediately.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weakness
traits.description: The vampire has these weaknesses: Forbiddance (can't enter a residence without invitation), Running Water (takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water), Stake to the Heart (destroyed if a Piercing weapon is driven into its heart while Incapacitated), Sunlight (takes 20 Radiant damage at start of turn in sunlight, Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The vampire makes two Claw attacks and uses Bite.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (2d4 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from one of two claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition. *Failure:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

bonusActions.name: Deathless Agility
bonusActions.description: The vampire takes the Dash or Disengage action.

traits.name: Water Form
traits.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

traits.name: Freeze
traits.description: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Whelm
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in the elemental's space. *Failure:* 22 (4d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Restrained condition, is suffocating unless it can breathe water, and takes 9 (2d8) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the elemental's turns. The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at a time with Whelm. As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature out of it by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength (Athletics) check. *Success:* Half damage only.

name: Werebear
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The werebear has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The werebear makes two attacks, using Handaxe or Rend in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d12 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14. *Failure:* The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a **Werebear** under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. *Success:* The target is immune to this werebear's curse for 24 hours.

actions.name: Handaxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 14 (3d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Rend (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The werebear shape-shifts into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or Large bear, or returns to humanoid form. Statistics other than size are the same.

description: Werebears shape-shift from humanoid forms into mighty bears or hybrids. They protect the wilds and aid Fey, druids, or spirits of the wilderness.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 21 (4d8 + 3) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

actions.name: Create Specter
actions.description: The wraith targets a Humanoid corpse within 10 feet of itself that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute. The target's spirit rises as a **Specter** in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at a time.

name: Xorn

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Treasure Sense
traits.description: The xorn can pinpoint the location of precious metals and stones within 60 feet of itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The xorn makes one Bite attack and three Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 17 (4d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

bonusActions.name: Charge
bonusActions.description: The xorn moves up to its Speed or Burrow Speed straight toward an enemy it can sense.

description: Treasure-Devouring Glutton. Xorn roam in search of gems, crystals, and veins of precious metals.

name: Young Remorhaz

traits.name: Heat Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the remorhaz's turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the remorhaz takes 11 (2d10) Fire damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

description: Young remorhazes are smaller but still formidable versions of the adult remorhaz, scorching and consuming any creatures they can chase down.

name: Azer Pyromancer

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the azer's turns, each creature of the azer's choice in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the azer takes 11 (2d10) Fire damage unless the azer has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The azer sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The azer makes two Flame Burst attacks.

actions.name: Flame Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The azer casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Elementalism*, *Mage Hand*
**1/Day:** *Fireball*

reactions.name: Hellish Rebuke
reactions.description: The azer casts *Hellish Rebuke* in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Fiery Smiths of Living Metal. Azer pyromancers conjure flames from the Elemental Plane of Fire.

name: Chasme

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the chasme dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The chasme has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The chasme can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

bonusActions.name: Drone
bonusActions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the chasme (demons automatically succeed on this save). Failure: The target has the Unconscious condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. The target succeeds automatically after 10 minutes or if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to empty a flask of Holy Water on it. Success: The target is immune to this chasme's Drone for 24 hours.

description: Flying forth from the Abyss, chasmes resemble horse-size flies. They incapacitate foes by producing a mind-numbing droning, then use their proboscises to drain victims of life.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The chimera makes one Ram attack, one Bite attack, and one Claw attack. It can replace the Claw attack with a use of Fire Breath if available.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage, or 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage if the chimera had Advantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Ram
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d12 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the *Prone* condition.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. *Failure:* 31 (7d8) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

traits.name: Poor Depth Perception
traits.description: The cyclops has Disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cyclops makes two attacks, using Greatclub or Rock in any combination.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Limited Foresight
reactions.description: *Trigger:* A creature the cyclops can see makes an attack roll against it. *Response:* The cyclops imposes Disadvantage on the roll, and the cyclops gains Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the cyclops's next turn.

name: Drider

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the drider has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the drider knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The drider makes three attacks, using Foreleg or Poison Burst in any combination.

actions.name: Foreleg
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Poison Burst
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Poison damage.

description: Driders are drow that have been transformed into half-spider monstrosities as punishment by Lolth. They lurk in the Underdark, spinning webs and hunting in darkness.

bonusActions.name: Magic of the Spider Queen
bonusActions.description: The drider casts *Darkness*, *Faerie Fire*, or *Web*, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14).

name: Galeb Duhr

actions.name: Avalanche Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the galeb duhr moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Bludgeoning damage and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Animate Boulders
actions.description: The galeb duhr magically animates one or two boulders it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each boulder uses the **Galeb Duhr** stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1 and lacks this action. The boulder takes its turn immediately after the galeb duhr on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the galeb duhr. A boulder remains animate for 1 minute or until it or the galeb duhr dies.

description: Eyes and Ears of the Earth. Beings of living rock, galeb duhr seek harmony with the earth.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ghast makes two Horrific Necrosis attacks. It can replace one attack with a Claw attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target isn't an Undead, it has the *Paralyzed* condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Horrific Necrosis
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Necrotic damage, and the target has the *Frightened* condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The ghast casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:
**At Will:** *Speak with Dead*, *Thaumaturgy*

traits.name: Stench
traits.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, any creature that starts its turn in a 5-foot *Emanation* originating from the ghast. *Failure:* The target has the *Poisoned* condition until the start of its next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

name: Githzerai Zerth

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no Shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The githzerai makes two Psi Strike attacks.

actions.name: Psi Strike
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):

description: Githzerai zerths are the most disciplined and powerful of their kind, capable of bending the fabric of reality through sheer willpower.

bonusActions.name: Psi-Powered Leap
bonusActions.description: The githzerai casts *Jump*, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

reactions.name: Psionic Defense
reactions.description: The githzerai casts *Feather Fall* or *Shield* in response to the spell's trigger, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

name: Hobgoblin Warlord

traits.name: Aura of Authority
traits.description: While in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the hobgoblin, the hobgoblin and its allies have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the hobgoblin doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hobgoblin makes three attacks, using Javelin or Longsword in any combination.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed decreases by 10 feet until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Slashing damage.

bonusActions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
bonusActions.description: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin warlord can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin warlord. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin warlord has the Incapacitated condition or dies.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The hobgoblin warlord adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin warlord must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description: Hobgoblin warlords are cunning military commanders who lead armies of goblinoids into battle.

name: Invisible Stalker

traits.name: Air Form
traits.description: The stalker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Invisibility
traits.description: The stalker has the Invisible condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The stalker makes three Wind Swipe attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Vortex.

actions.name: Wind Swipe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Force damage.

actions.name: Vortex
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, one Large or smaller creature in the stalker's space. *Failure:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Thunder damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, the target can't cast spells with a Verbal component and takes 7 (2d6) Thunder damage at the start of each of the stalker's turns.

description: Unseen Magical Assassin. Bodiless spirits of the air that pass unseen.

name: Kuo-toa Archpriest

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Otherworldly Perception
traits.description: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is Invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

traits.name: Slippery
traits.description: The kuo-toa has Advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a Grapple.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The kuo-toa makes three Strange Scepter attacks.

actions.name: Strange Scepter
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 20 (5d6 + 3) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The kuo-toa casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Thaumaturgy*
**1/Day Each:** *Destructive Wave*, *Divination*, *Hold Monster* (level 6 version), *Scrying*, *Tongues*

description: Kuo-toa archpriests are the highest-ranking clergy in kuo-toa communities, wielding potent divine magic granted by their strange gods.

bonusActions.name: Shield of Faith
bonusActions.description: The kuo-toa casts *Shield of Faith*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

traits.name: Petrifying Gaze
traits.description: When a creature that can see the medusa's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the medusa, the medusa can force it to make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw if the medusa isn't Incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly Petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and has the Restrained condition. The Restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming Petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by Greater Restoration or similar magic. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the medusa until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the medusa in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If the medusa sees itself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet and in an area of bright light, the medusa is, due to its curse, affected by its own gaze.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The medusa makes two Claw attacks and one Snake Hair attack, or it makes three Poison Ray attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Snake Hair
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 150 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Poison damage.

bonusActions.name: Petrifying Gaze
bonusActions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. If the medusa sees its reflection in the Cone, the medusa must make this save. *First Failure:* The target has the Restrained condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. *Second Failure:* The target has the Petrified condition instead of the Restrained condition.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The merfolk makes two Aquatic Burst attacks.

actions.name: Aquatic Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 20 (3d10 + 4) Cold damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The merfolk casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Elementalism*, *Light*
**1/Day Each:** *Control Water*, *Create or Destroy Water*

reactions.name: Watery Rebuke
reactions.description: Trigger: An enemy the merfolk can see enters a space within 5 feet of the merfolk. ResponseStrength Saving Throw: DC 15, the triggering enemy. Failure: 14 (4d6) Cold damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the merfolk by conjured water.

name: Satyr Revelmaster

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The satyr has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The satyr makes three Prance attacks.

actions.name: Prance
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Charmed condition until the start of the satyr's next turn.

actions.name: Fey Melody
actions.description: The satyr conjures a charming or frightening song. *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 14, each enemy in a 60-foot Emanation originating from the satyr. *Failure:* The target is subjected to the song's effect:

description: Horned and Hoofed Revelers. Satyr revelmasters use magical music to change the moods of other creatures.

name: Vrock
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the vrock dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The vrock has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The vrock makes two Shred attacks.

actions.name: Shred
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spores
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the vrock. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. While Poisoned, the target takes 5 (1d10) Poison damage at the start of each of its turns. Emptying a flask of Holy Water on the target ends the effect early.

actions.name: Stunning Screech
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the vrock (demons succeed automatically). *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Thunder damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the end of the vrock's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The wyvern makes one Bite attack and one Sting attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 24 (7d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the wyvern's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace two attacks with a use of Sleep Breath.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 40-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 38 (11d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Sleep Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save. *Second Failure:* The target has the Unconscious condition for 1 minute. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

traits.name: Ice Walk
traits.description: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 40 (9d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

name: Blue Slaad

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The slaad regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The slaad makes three Mutating Claw attacks.

actions.name: Mutating Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a slaad, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15. *Failure:* The target is cursed. The cursed target can't regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) after every 24 hours and doesn't return to normal after finishing a Long Rest. If the curse reduces the target's Hit Point maximum to 0, the curse ends, and instead of dying, the target instantly transforms into a **Red Slaad** or, if it can cast spells of level 3 or higher, a **Green Slaad**. Only a *Wish* spell can reverse this transformation.

description: Blue slaadi are fierce combatants that spread their chaotic taint by transforming Humanoid victims into red slaadi through a virulent disease delivered by their claws.

name: Centaur Warden

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The centaur makes two attacks, using Forest Staff or Sun Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Forest Staff
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Sun Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, range 90 ft. *Hit:* 14 (3d6 + 4) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the start of the centaur's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The centaur casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

bonusActions.name: Entangling Trail
bonusActions.description: The centaur moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. Each creature within 5 feet of the centaur as it moves is targeted once by the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Restrained condition until the end of its next turn.

description: Defenders of the Feywild. Centaur wardens often lead groups of centaur troopers.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The revenant makes two Suffocate attacks.

actions.name: Suffocate
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d10 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is suffocating. The revenant can have up to two targets Grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Haunting Glare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the revenant. *Failure:* The target has the Paralyzed condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the revenant dies, it revives 24 hours later unless *Dispel Evil or Good* is cast on its remains. If it revives, it animates another group of corpses elsewhere on the same plane of existence; it now looks different but uses the same stat block and returns with all its Hit Points.

name: Grick Ancient
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.description: The grick has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The grick makes one Beak attack, one Slam attack, and one Tentacles attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the *Prone* condition.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the *Grappled* condition (escape DC 14) from all four tentacles.

description: The grick alpha is a larger, more powerful version of the grick that leads packs of its smaller kin, dominating cavern ecosystems.

name: Mind Flayer

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The mind flayer has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d8 + 4) Psychic damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from all the mind flayer's tentacles, and the target has the Stunned condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
