actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, one creature that is Grappled by the mind flayer's Tentacles. *Failure:* 55 (10d10) Piercing damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the mind flayer kills it and devours its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast
actions.description: *Intelligence Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 31 (6d8 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the end of the mind flayer's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The mind flayer casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

description: A mind flayer's hunger for brains is outmeasured only by its thirst for dominance.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The oni's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The oni regains 10 HP at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 HP.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The oni makes two Claw or Nightmare Ray attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.
multiattackActions: oni makes two Claw or Nightmare Ray

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Nightmare Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the start of the oni's next turn.

actions.name: Shape-Shift
actions.description: The oni shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid or a Large Giant, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The oni casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
**1/Day Each:** *Charm Person* (level 2 version), *Darkness*, *Gaseous Form*, *Sleep*

bonusActions.name: Invisibility
bonusActions.description: The oni casts *Invisibility* on itself, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The owlbear makes two Ravage attacks.

actions.name: Ravage
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and the owlbear moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Slashing damage and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Screech
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the owlbear. *Failure:* 27 (6d8) Thunder damage, and the target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The owlbear has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

name: Shield Guardian
languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak

traits.name: Bound
traits.description: The shield guardian is magically bound to an amulet. As long as the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (rounded up) is transferred to the guardian.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The shield guardian regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

traits.name: Spell Storing
traits.description: A spellcaster who wears the shield guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of 4th level or lower. The spell is cast at the guardian, which can then cast it once at the command of its master or the next time a specified triggering condition occurs.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The guardian makes two Fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Force damage.

reactions.name: Protection
reactions.description: *Trigger:* An attack roll hits the wearer of the guardian's amulet while the wearer is within 5 feet of the guardian. *Response:* The wearer gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack and possibly causing it to miss, until the start of the guardian's next turn.

description: Shield guardians are powerful construct bodyguards bound to a magical amulet, protecting whoever wears it.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.description: The giant has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Stone Club or Boulder in any combination.

actions.name: Stone Club
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Boulder
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 60/240 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

reactions.name: Deflect Missile
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The giant is hit by a ranged attack roll and takes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage from it. *Response:* The giant reduces the damage it takes from the attack by 11 (1d10 + 6), and if that damage is reduced to 0, the giant can redirect some of the attack's force. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature the giant can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 11 (1d10 + 6) Force damage.

name: Tree Blight
languages: Understands Common and Druidic but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The blight makes two Branch attacks and uses Grasping Root.

actions.name: Branch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Grasping Root
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 17, one Large or smaller creature the blight can see within 15 feet. *Failure:* The target is pulled up to 10 feet straight toward the blight and has the Grappled condition (escape DC 16) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 13 (2d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns.

bonusActions.name: Gnash
bonusActions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature Grappled by the blight. *Failure:* 19 (3d8 + 6) Piercing damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The necrohulk makes two Rotting Slam attacks.

actions.name: Rotting Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spore Bomb
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the necrohulk can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 28 (8d6) Necrotic damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the necrohulk's next turn. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points. *Success:* Half damage only.

bonusActions.name: Absorb Body
bonusActions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 15, one Medium or Small creature the necrohulk can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* The target is pulled into the necrohulk's space and becomes grafted to its body. The necrohulk can have only one target grafted at a time.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 49 (14d6) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Slowing Breath.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 40-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 40 (9d8) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Slowing Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target can't take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

name: Yuan-ti Abomination

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yuan-ti makes two Bite attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast *Suggestion* if available.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 15, one Large or smaller creature within 5 feet. *Failure:* 28 (7d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Poison Spray
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 21 (6d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of the yuan-ti's next turn. While Poisoned, the target has the Blinded condition. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.description:
The yuan-ti casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Animal Friendship* (snakes only)
**3/Day:** *Suggestion*

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The yuan-ti shape-shifts into a Large snake or returns to its true form. If it dies, it stays in its current form. The yuan-ti's game statistics are the same in each form, except where noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

description: Yuan-ti abominations are the most powerful yuan-ti, fully serpentine monstrosities that rule yuan-ti society with cruel cunning.

name: Chain Devil

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes two Chain attacks and uses Conjure Infernal Chain.

actions.name: Chain
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 10 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of two chains, and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Conjure Infernal Chain
actions.description: The devil conjures a fiery chain to bind a creature. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the devil can see within 60 feet. Failure: 9 (2d4 + 4) Fire damage, and the target has the Restrained condition until the end of the devil's next turn, at which point the chain disappears. If the target is Large or smaller, the devil moves the target up to 30 feet straight toward itself. Success: The chain disappears.

reactions.name: Unnerving Gaze
reactions.description: *Trigger:* A creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil and can see the devil. *Response* - *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 15, the triggering creature. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition until the end of its turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this devil's Unnerving Gaze for 24 hours.

description: Also known as kytons, chain devils consider themselves morbid artisans who use deception, menace, and vicious metal to coerce prisoners into betraying themselves.

name: Cloaker

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.description: While in Bright Light, the cloaker has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cloaker makes one Attach attack and two Tail attacks.

actions.name: Attach
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the cloaker attaches to it. While the cloaker is attached, the target has the Blinded condition, and the cloaker can't make Bite attacks against other targets. In addition, the cloaker halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

description: Mysterious Underdark predators that use their mottled hides to blend in and unfurl to smother unsuspecting prey.

bonusActions.name: Phantasms
bonusActions.description: The cloaker casts the *Mirror Image* spell, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. The spell ends early if the cloaker starts or ends its turn in Bright Light.

bonusActions.name: Moan
bonusActions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 60-foot Emanation originating from the cloaker. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition until the end of the cloaker's next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this cloaker's Moan for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cockatrice makes one Petrifying Bite attack and two Talons attacks.

actions.name: Petrifying Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14. *First Failure:* The target has the *Restrained* condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. *Second Failure:* The target has the *Petrified* condition instead of the Restrained condition.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 18 (4d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The cockatrice doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

reactions.name: Magical Backlash
reactions.description: *Trigger:* A creature within 120 feet of the cockatrice deals damage to it. *Response--Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 14, the triggering creature. *Failure:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Force damage.

name: Fomorian

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The fomorian makes two Greatclub attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Warping Hex if available.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 24 (4d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Warping Hex
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature the fomorian can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 21 (6d6) Psychic damage, and the target gains 1 Exhaustion level. *Success:* Half damage only.

traits.name: Curse of the Evil Eye
traits.description: When a creature that can see the fomorian's eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the fomorian, the fomorian can force it to make a DC 14 Charisma saving throw if the fomorian isn't Incapacitated and can see the creature. On a failed save, the creature has the Frightened condition until the start of its next turn.

description: Fomorians are hideous, deformed giants cursed by the Feywild for their vanity. They dwell in the Underdark, nursing ancient grudges.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Frost Axe or Great Bow in any combination.

actions.name: Frost Axe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 19 (2d12 + 6) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Cold damage.

actions.name: Great Bow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d10 + 6) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Cold damage, and the target's Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

bonusActions.name: War Cry
bonusActions.description: The giant or one creature of its choice that can see or hear it gains 16 (2d10 + 5) Temporary Hit Points and has Advantage on attack rolls until the start of the giant's next turn.

name: Githyanki Knight

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The githyanki makes three Silver Sword attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Telekinesis* if available.

actions.name: Silver Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Psychic damage. *Critical Hit:* If the target is in an astral body (as with the *Astral Projection* spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body instead of dealing damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The githyanki adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the githyanki must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description: Githyanki knights are elite warriors who lead raids across the planes and serve as officers in githyanki armies.

bonusActions.name: Misty Step
bonusActions.description: The githyanki casts *Misty Step*, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The gnoll makes two Abyssal Strike attacks.

actions.name: Abyssal Strike
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 20 (5d6 + 3) Poison damage.

actions.name: Hunger of Yeenoghu
actions.description: The gnoll conjures a 30-foot Cube of magical Darkness originating from a point it can see within 60 feet, which lasts for 1 minute or until the gnoll's Concentration ends on it. This area is Difficult Terrain. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 14, any creature that starts its turn in this area or enters it for the first time on a turn. *Failure:* 28 (8d6) Necrotic damage, and the gnoll or a creature of its choice it can see gains 10 Temporary Hit Points. *Success:* Half damage only.

bonusActions.name: Rampage
bonusActions.description: Immediately after dealing damage to a creature that is already Bloodied, the gnoll moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Abyssal Strike attack.

name: Green Slaad

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The slaad regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The slaad makes three Chaos Staff attacks.

actions.name: Chaos Staff
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Force damage. Until the start of the slaad's next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a **1**, Charmed; on a **2**, Frightened; on a **3**, Poisoned; or on a **4**, Incapacitated.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The slaad casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks):

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The slaad shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

description: Green slaadi are more intelligent than their red and blue counterparts and are capable of assuming Humanoid forms. They lurk among civilized populations, sowing chaos from within.

name: Hezrou
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the hezrou dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The hezrou has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Stench
traits.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 16, any creature that starts its turn in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the hezrou. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hezrou makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d4 + 4) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Poison damage.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The hezrou jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
traits.description: The hydra has five heads. Whenever the hydra takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The hydra dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the hydra grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 20 Hit Points when it grows new heads.

traits.name: Reactive Heads
traits.description: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra Reaction that can be used only for Opportunity Attacks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hydra makes as many Bite attacks as it has heads.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d10 + 5) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.description: No magic can observe the sphinx remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The sphinx has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sphinx makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Curse of the Riddle.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Curse of the Riddle
actions.description: *Intelligence Saving Throw:* DC 15, one creature the sphinx can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 21 (6d6) Psychic damage, and the target is cursed with a riddle. The cursed target has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls. In addition, if it takes the Magic action, it must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or that action is wasted. The cursed target can take a Study action to make a DC 15 Intelligence check, solving the riddle and ending the curse on a success. The curse ends early if the sphinx curses another target.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The sphinx casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

name: Spirit Naga

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its Hit Points. Only a *Wish* spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The naga makes three attacks, using Bite or Necrotic Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +6, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 21 (6d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring no Somatic or Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):

description: Spirit nagas are evil serpentine spellcasters that are virtually immortal. They plot and scheme from hidden lairs, pursuing dark knowledge and personal power.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The thri-kreen makes three Psionic Lance attacks.

actions.name: Psionic Lance
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 18 (4d6 + 4) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The thri-kreen casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Mage Hand* (the hand is Invisible)
**1/Day Each:** *Detect Thoughts*, *Sending*, *Synaptic Static*

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The vampire makes one Bite attack and one Shadow Strike attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

actions.name: Shadow Strike
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Cold damage.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.description: The vampire takes 10 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the vampire takes the Hide action.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Repulsion Breath.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d10 + 5) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 49 (9d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Repulsion Breath
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target is pushed up to 40 feet straight away from the dragon and has the Prone condition.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 42 (12d6) Poison damage. *Success:* Half damage.

name: Abominable Yeti

traits.name: Fear of Fire
traits.description: If the yeti takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Snow Camouflage
traits.description: The yeti has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two attacks, using Claw or Ice Throw in any combination.
multiattackActions: yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Throw
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +11, range 60/240 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d4 + 7) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Cold damage.

actions.name: Chilling Gaze
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 18, one creature the yeti can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* 21 (6d6) Cold damage, and the target has the Paralyzed condition until the start of the yeti's next turn unless the target has Immunity to Cold damage. *Success:* The target is immune to this yeti's Chilling Gaze for 1 hour.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 45 (10d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

description: Abominable yetis are massive, terrifying predators that rule the highest frozen peaks. They possess a devastating cold breath weapon and a paralyzing gaze.

name: Bone Devil
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes two Claw attacks and one Infernal Sting attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Infernal Sting
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the devil's next turn. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The gorgon makes two Gore attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Smelting Charge
actions.description: The gorgon moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and can move through the spaces of Medium or smaller creatures. Each time the gorgon enters a creature's space for the first time during this move, that target is subjected to the following effect. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 16. *Failure:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) Fire damage, and the target is pulled into the gorgon's space and has the *Grappled* condition (escape DC 14); if the gorgon already has a creature Grappled, the target has the *Prone* condition instead. Until the grapple ends, the target has the *Restrained* condition. When the gorgon moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing no extra movement.

traits.name: Flame Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the gorgon's turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the gorgon takes 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The gorgon sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

name: Clay Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't Adamantine

traits.name: Acid Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to Acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Acid damage dealt.

traits.name: Berserk
traits.description: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 60 Hit Points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its Hit Points.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The golem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The golem makes two Slam attacks, or it makes three Slam attacks if it used Hasten this turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d10 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 6 (1d12) Acid damage, and the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Acid damage taken.

description: Clay golems are massive constructs shaped from enchanted clay, capable of reducing the very life force of their foes.

bonusActions.name: Hasten
bonusActions.description: The golem takes the Dash and Disengage actions.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The giant has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Thunderous Mace or Thundercloud in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Fog Cloud*.

actions.name: Thunderous Mace
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +12, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 21 (3d8 + 8) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Thunder damage.

actions.name: Thundercloud
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +12, range 240 ft. *Hit:* 18 (3d6 + 8) Thunder damage, and the target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The giant casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Fog Cloud*, *Light*
**1/Day Each:** *Control Weather*, *Gaseous Form*, *Telekinesis*

bonusActions.name: Misty Step
bonusActions.description: The giant casts the *Misty Step* spell, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Flame Sword or Hammer Throw in any combination.

actions.name: Flame Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 21 (4d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Hammer Throw
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +11, range 60/240 ft. *Hit:* 23 (3d10 + 7) Bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) Fire damage, and the target is pushed up to 15 feet straight away from the giant and has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

name: Glabrezu

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the glabrezu dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The glabrezu has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The glabrezu makes two Pincer attacks and uses Pummel or Spellcasting.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 10 ft. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) Slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15) from one of two pincers.

actions.name: Pummel
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature Grappled by the glabrezu. Failure: 15 (3d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The glabrezu casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): At Will: Darkness, Detect Magic, Dispel Magic. 1/Day Each: Confusion, Fly, Power Word Stun.

description: Glabrezus embody delusion and predatory guile. These cunning demons know the most effective traps are those that individuals devise for themselves.

name: Gray Slaad

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The slaad regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The slaad makes two Chaos Claw attacks.

actions.name: Chaos Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Necrotic damage. Until the start of the slaad's next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a **1**, Charmed; on a **2**, Frightened; on a **3**, Poisoned; or on a **4**, Incapacitated.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The slaad casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The slaad shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

description: Gray slaadi are the most cunning of the common slaadi. They seek to spread chaos through subtlety and manipulation, often assuming Humanoid guises to infiltrate civilizations.

name: Nycaloth

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the nycaloth dies outside Gehenna, it revives there instantly.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The nycaloth makes two Mercurial Axe attacks.

actions.name: Mercurial Axe
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, reach 10 ft. or range 30/90 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d12 + 5) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Force damage. *Hit or Miss:* The axe magically returns to the nycaloth's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

bonusActions.name: Shadowy Teleport
bonusActions.description: Invisible for 1 minute, teleports up to 30 feet. Invisibility ends after dealing damage.

description: Fiendish warmongers that relish combat and conquest, teleporting around battlefields with shifting axes.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The treant makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hail of Bark
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, range 180 ft. *Hit:* 28 (4d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Animate Trees
actions.description: The treant magically animates up to two trees it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each tree uses the **Treant** stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. The tree takes its turn immediately after the treant on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the treant. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than 120 feet from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 16, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 55 (10d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Paralyzing Breath.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 49 (11d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *First Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save. *Second Failure:* The target has the Paralyzed condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

name: Aboleth

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Eldritch Restoration
traits.description: If destroyed, the aboleth gains a new body in 5d10 days, reviving with all its Hit Points in the Far Realm or another location chosen by the DM.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Mucus Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by mucus. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the aboleth at the end of the aboleth's turn. Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain Hit Points unless it is underwater.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.description: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks and uses either Consume Memories or Dominate Mind if available.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of four tentacles.

actions.name: Consume Memories
actions.description: *Intelligence Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature within 30 feet that is Charmed or Grappled by the aboleth. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Psychic damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* The aboleth gains the target's memories if the target is a Humanoid and is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this action.

actions.name: Dominate Mind
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature the aboleth can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Charmed condition until the aboleth dies or is on a different plane of existence from the target. While Charmed, the target acts as an ally to the aboleth and is under its control while within 60 feet of it. In addition, the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. The target repeats the save whenever it takes damage as well as after every 24 hours it spends at least 1 mile away from the aboleth, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Lash
actions.description: The aboleth makes one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Psychic Drain
actions.description: If the aboleth has at least one creature Charmed or Grappled, it uses Consume Memories and regains 5 (1d10) Hit Points.

actions.name: Foul Water
actions.description: Water sources within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally fouled. Creatures that drink such water must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

actions.name: Psionic Projection
actions.description: While in its lair, the aboleth can cast Project Image, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16).

description: In aquatic abysses, aboleths dream of dead empires and orchestrate plots that unfold across ages.

name: Clay Colossus
languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak

traits.name: Acid Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the colossus is subjected to Acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Acid damage dealt.

traits.name: Berserk
traits.description: Whenever the colossus starts its turn with 80 Hit Points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the colossus goes berserk, attacking the nearest creature it can see. Once berserk, it continues until it is destroyed or regains all its Hit Points.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The colossus has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The colossus makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +11, reach 10 ft. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have its Hit Point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its Hit Point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the Greater Restoration spell or similar magic.

actions.name: Haste (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Until the end of its next turn, the colossus magically gains a +2 bonus to its AC, has Advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and can use its Slam attack as a Bonus Action.

description: Clay colossi are towering constructs animated by powerful magic, shaped from enormous masses of clay.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cyclops makes three attacks, using Radiant Strike or Flash of Light in any combination.

actions.name: Radiant Strike
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 22 (3d10 + 6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Flash of Light
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d10 + 6) Radiant damage, and the target has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the cyclops's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The cyclops casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
**2/Day Each:** *Arcane Eye*, *Detect Magic*, *Locate Object*
**1/Day:** *Legend Lore*

reactions.name: Portent
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The cyclops or an ally it can see makes a D20 Test. *Response:* The cyclops rolls 1d20 and chooses whether to use that roll in place of the d20 rolled for the D20 Test.

name: Death Slaad

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The slaad regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The slaad makes two Chaos Blade attacks.

actions.name: Chaos Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 11 (1d12 + 5) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. Until the start of the slaad's next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a **1**, Charmed; on a **2**, Frightened; on a **3**, Poisoned; or on a **4**, Incapacitated.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The slaad casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The slaad shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

description: Death slaadi are the most powerful of the common slaadi, having transcended through chaotic power. They command lesser slaadi and plot the destruction of order wherever they find it.

name: Deva

traits.name: Exalted Restoration
traits.description: If the deva dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The deva has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

atWill: Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The deva makes two Holy Mace attacks.

actions.name: Holy Mace
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The deva casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*, *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Commune*, *Raise Dead*

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The deva casts *Cure Wounds*, *Lesser Restoration*, or *Remove Curse*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: World-Changing Angelic Messenger. Devas are emissaries of divine will.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The worg makes three Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the worg's next turn. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points.

actions.name: Dreadful Howl
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 16, each creature within 30 feet that isn't a worg. *Failure:* 36 (8d8) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the start of the worg's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The worg has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Warp Step
bonusActions.description: The worg teleports, along with a willing creature of its choice within 5 feet of it, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

name: Guardian Naga

traits.name: Celestial Restoration
traits.description: If the naga dies, it returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its Hit Points unless *Dispel Evil and Good* is cast on its remains.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The naga makes two Bite attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of Poisonous Spittle.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d12 + 4) Piercing damage plus 22 (4d10) Poison damage.

actions.name: Poisonous Spittle
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature the naga can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 31 (7d8) Poison damage, and the target has the *Blinded* condition until the start of the naga's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring no Somatic or Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
**At Will:** *Thaumaturgy*
**1/Day Each:** *Clairvoyance*, *Cure Wounds* (level 6 version), *Flame Strike* (level 6 version), *Geas*, *True Seeing*

description: Guardian nagas are benevolent serpentine creatures that protect sacred places. They are wise, patient, and nearly immortal thanks to their ability to rejuvenate after death.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The revenant makes two Object Slam attacks and uses Invitation.

actions.name: Object Slam
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +9 (with Advantage if the target is inside the revenant's space), reach 10 ft. or range 30/90 ft. *Hit:* 27 (5d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Invitation
actions.description: *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target is teleported inside the revenant's space and swallowed. A swallowed creature has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the revenant.

traits.name: Haunted Zone
traits.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 17, any creature that casts a spell while inside the revenant's space. *Failure:* The spell fails and is wasted.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the revenant dies, it revives 24 hours later unless *Dispel Evil or Good* is cast on its remains. If it revives, it animates another Gargantuan object or structure elsewhere on the same plane of existence; it now looks different but uses the same stat block and returns with all its Hit Points.

name: Stone Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't Adamantine

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The golem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The golem makes two attacks, using Slam or Force Bolt in any combination.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) Force damage.

actions.name: Force Bolt
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d10) Force damage.

description: Stone golems are powerful constructs carved from solid rock, serving as tireless guardians.

bonusActions.name: Slow
bonusActions.description: The golem casts the *Slow* spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17).

name: Yochlol

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the yochlol dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The yochlol has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webs.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yochlol makes two Caustic Lash attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast Web or Dominate Person if available.

actions.name: Caustic Lash
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) Acid damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The yochlol casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At Will: Detect Thoughts, Gaseous Form (self only), Web. 1/Day: Dominate Person.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The yochlol shape-shifts into a Medium Humanoid or a Medium spider or back into its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

reactions.name: Toxic Escape
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The yochlol is hit by an attack roll. *Response:* The yochlol halves the attack's damage to itself (round down), and it teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of itself. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature within 5 feet of the yochlol's destination space. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, it has the Incapacitated condition.

description: Yochlols embody the pernicious will and infectious philosophies of the Abyss. In their rarely seen true forms, these noxious manipulators appear as ever-shifting masses of dripping tentacles and toxic flesh crowned by a single baleful eye.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Weakening Breath.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d10 + 6) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 55 (10d10) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Weakening Breath
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature that isn't currently affected by this breath in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Tests and subtracts 3 (1d6) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 56 (16d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

name: Behir

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The behir makes one Bite attack and uses Constrict.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 19 (2d12 + 6) Piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 18, one Large or smaller creature the behir can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* 28 (5d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the *Grappled* condition (escape DC 16), and it has the *Restrained* condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 16, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 66 (12d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

bonusActions.name: Swallow
bonusActions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, one Large or smaller creature Grappled by the behir (the behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time). Failure: The behir swallows the target, which is no longer Grappled. While swallowed, a creature has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and takes 21 (6d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls in a space within 10 feet of the behir and has the Prone condition. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

description: Twelve-legged, reptilian predators, behirs endlessly hunt for their next meal. Their short legs propel them quickly across floors and walls. Any prey that behirs can't chase down, they blast with breaths of powerful lightning.

name: Dao

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The dao can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the dao doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Elemental Restoration
traits.description: If the dao dies outside the Elemental Plane of Earth, its body dissolves into dirt, and it gains a new body in 1d4 days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Earth.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The dao has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Wishes
traits.description: The dao has a 30 percent chance of knowing the Wish spell. If the dao knows it, the dao can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the dao can understand. If the dao casts the spell for the creature, the dao suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the dao has cast it three times, the dao can't do so again for 365 days.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dao makes three Earthen Maul attacks or two Earth Burst attacks.

actions.name: Earthen Maul
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 20 (4d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Earth Burst
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. *Hit or Miss:* Earth explodes from the target's space, creating the following effect. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 16, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from and including the target. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Thunder damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The dao casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

description: Genie of the Earth. Genies of minerals and gemstones, dao embody the resolve of rock.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aspirant makes three Dread Blade attacks.

actions.name: Dread Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d8 + 5) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Hellfire Orb
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot-radius *Sphere* centered on a point the aspirant can see within 120 feet of itself. *Failure:* 21 (6d6) Fire damage plus 21 (6d6) Necrotic damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The aspirant casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Phantom Steed*
**1/Day:** *Destructive Wave* (Necrotic), *Dispel Magic*

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The aspirant has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Marshal Undead
traits.description: Undead creatures of the aspirant's choice (excluding itself) in a 60-foot *Emanation* originating from it have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws. It can't use this trait if it has the *Incapacitated* condition.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The aspirant is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. *Response:* The aspirant adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

name: Djinni

traits.name: Elemental Restoration
traits.description: If the djinni dies outside the Elemental Plane of Air, its body dissolves into mist, and it gains a new body in 1d4 days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Air.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The djinni has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Wishes
traits.description: The djinni has a 30 percent chance of knowing the Wish spell. If the djinni knows it, the djinni can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the djinni can understand. If the djinni casts the spell for the creature, the djinni suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the djinni has cast it three times, the djinni can't do so again for 365 days.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The djinni makes three attacks, using Storm Blade or Storm Bolt in any combination.

actions.name: Storm Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Storm Bolt
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d8) Thunder damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Create Whirlwind
actions.description: The djinni conjures a whirlwind at a point it can see within 120 feet. The whirlwind fills a 20-foot-radius, 60-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. The whirlwind lasts until the djinni's Concentration on it ends. The djinni can move the whirlwind up to 20 feet at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The djinni casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

description: Genie of the Air. As genies of wind and skies, djinn personify freedom and might.

name: Efreeti

traits.name: Elemental Restoration
traits.description: If the efreeti dies outside the Elemental Plane of Fire, its body dissolves into ash, and it gains a new body in 1d4 days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Fire.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The efreeti has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Wishes
traits.description: The efreeti has a 30 percent chance of knowing the Wish spell. If the efreeti knows it, the efreeti can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the efreeti can understand. If the efreeti casts the spell for the creature, the efreeti suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the efreeti has cast it three times, the efreeti can't do so again for 365 days.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The efreeti makes three attacks, using Heated Blade or Hurl Flame in any combination.

actions.name: Heated Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 13 (2d12) Fire damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +8, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 24 (7d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The efreeti casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

description: Genie of Fire. Efreet burn with the energy and unpredictability of fire.

name: Gynosphinx

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.description: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any Divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the sphinx fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sphinx makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Claw Attack
actions.description: The sphinx makes one Claw attack.

actions.name: Teleport (2 Actions)
actions.description: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Cast a Spell (3 Actions)
actions.description: The sphinx uses Spellcasting.

description: A gynosphinx is a celestial guardian with the body of a lion and the head of a woman. Masters of riddles and arcane lore, they test the wisdom and worthiness of those who seek passage through the places they guard.

actions.name: Temporal Shift
actions.description: The flow of time within the lair is altered. Each creature in the lair must reroll initiative. The sphinx chooses whether to reroll.

actions.name: Planar Trap
actions.description: The lair fills with magical darkness (as the Darkness spell) in a 30-foot radius around a point the sphinx can see. The darkness lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round.

actions.name: Riddle Curse
actions.description: The sphinx targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or be teleported to a random unoccupied space within 60 feet.

effects.name: Riddle Magic
effects.description: The region within 1 mile of the sphinx's lair is warped by its presence. Each creature that finishes a long rest within 1 mile of the lair must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or be subjected to a random minor magical effect.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the sphinx dies, these effects end immediately.

name: Horned Devil

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes three attacks, using Searing Fork or Hurl Flame in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Infernal Tail.

actions.name: Searing Fork
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Fire damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +8, range 150 ft. Hit: 26 (5d8 + 4) Fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

actions.name: Infernal Tail
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature the devil can see within 10 feet. Failure: 10 (1d8 + 6) Necrotic damage, and the target receives an infernal wound if it doesn't have one. While wounded, the target loses 10 (3d6) Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a DC 17 Wisdom (Medicine) check.

description: Horned devils, also known as cornugons or malebranche, are infernal warriors that exact the will of diabolical generals and lead other devils in battle.

name: Marid

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The marid can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Elemental Restoration
traits.description: If the marid dies outside the Elemental Plane of Water, its body dissolves into brine, and it gains a new body in 1d4 days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Water.

traits.name: Wishes
traits.description: The marid has a 30 percent chance of knowing the Wish spell. If the marid knows it, the marid can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the marid can understand. If the marid casts the spell for the creature, the marid suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the marid has cast it three times, the marid can't do so again for 365 days.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The marid makes three Aquatic Lash attacks.

actions.name: Aquatic Lash
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Cold damage.

actions.name: Water Jet
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 31 (9d6) Cold damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the marid and has the Prone condition. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The marid casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

bonusActions.name: Misty Veil
bonusActions.description: The marid casts Fog Cloud, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Genie of the Water. Marids surge with the power of the seas.

name: Mind Flayer Arcanist

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mind flayer makes three Arcane Tentacles attacks.
multiattackActions: mind flayer makes three Arcane Tentacles

actions.name: Arcane Tentacles
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 27 (4d10 + 5) Psychic damage, and the mind flayer can teleport the target up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space the mind flayer can see on a surface or liquid large enough to support the target. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the mind flayer kills it and magically devours its brain.

actions.name: Mind Burst
actions.description: *Intelligence Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 40-foot Emanation originating from the mind flayer. *Failure:* 41 (8d8 + 5) Psychic damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the end of the mind flayer's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The mind flayer casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

reactions.name: Shield
reactions.description: The mind flayer casts *Shield* in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Mind flayer arcanists enhance psionic abilities with magic. Other mind flayers view them with disgust and fear.

name: Remorhaz

traits.name: Heat Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the remorhaz's turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the remorhaz takes 16 (3d10) Fire damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d10 + 7) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 17), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

description: Remorhazes are massive, centipede-like predators that generate intense internal heat. They burrow through arctic ice and snow, melting tunnels as they go.

bonusActions.name: Swallow
bonusActions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 19, one Large or smaller creature Grappled by the remorhaz (it can have up to two creatures swallowed at a time). *Failure:* The target is swallowed by the remorhaz, and the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, it has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 10 (3d6) Acid damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

name: Roc

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.description: The roc has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The roc makes two Beak attacks. It can replace one attack with a Talons attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +13, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 28 (3d12 + 9) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +13, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 23 (4d6 + 9) Slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 19) from both talons, and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

bonusActions.name: Swoop
bonusActions.description: If the roc has a creature Grappled, the roc flies up to half its Fly Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and drops that creature.

description: Rocs are colossal birds of prey large enough to carry elephants. They nest on the highest mountain peaks and are so massive that their wingbeats create gale-force winds.

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.description: No magic can observe the sphinx remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the sphinx fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sphinx makes three Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (3d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Mind-Rending Roar
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 16, each enemy in a 300-foot Emanation originating from the sphinx. *Failure:* 35 (10d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Incapacitated condition until the start of the sphinx's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The sphinx casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

actions.name: Arcane Prowl
actions.description: The sphinx can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one Claw attack.

actions.name: Weight of Years
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature the sphinx can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* The target gains 1 Exhaustion level. While the target has any Exhaustion levels, it appears 3d10 years older. *Failure or Success:* The sphinx can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

lairActions.description: The region containing a sphinx of lore's lair is altered by its presence, creating the following effects:

actions.name: Distant Sight
actions.description: While in its lair, the sphinx can cast Clairvoyance, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as its Spellcasting action. When cast this way, the spell's range is 1 mile.

actions.name: Infusion of Knowledge
actions.description: Whenever the sphinx or one of its allies takes a Study action while within 1 mile of the lair, it adds 1d6 to any ability check it makes for that action.

name: Arcanaloth

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the arcanaloth dies outside Gehenna, it gains a new body instantly there.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Tome
traits.description: The arcanaloth has a magic tome (AC 17, HP 35, immune to Necrotic/Poison/Psychic). While holding it, can use Banishing Claw. Regains all HP each turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The arcanaloth makes three Fiendish Burst attacks. It can replace one attack with a Banishing Claw attack.

actions.name: Fiendish Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 31 (4d12 + 5) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Banishing Claw (Requires Soul Tome)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d4 + 5) Slashing damage plus 19 (3d12) Psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 17. *Failure:* The target is trapped in a demiplane inside the Soul Tome. While trapped there, the target has the Incapacitated condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, escaping the tome on a success.
