When the target escapes, it appears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, the nearest unoccupied space.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The arcanaloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: Teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Counterspell
reactions.description: Casts Counterspell in response to that spell's trigger.

description: Arcanaloths bend their intellects toward hoarding and exploiting secrets.

name: Erinyes
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the erinyes dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The erinyes has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Rope
traits.description: The erinyes has a magic rope. While bearing it, the erinyes can use the Entangling Rope action. The rope has AC 20, HP 90, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The rope turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points, if it is 5+ feet away from the erinyes for 1 hour or more, or if the erinyes dies. If the rope is damaged or destroyed, the erinyes can fully restore it when finishing a Short or Long Rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The erinyes makes three Infernal Sword attacks and can use Entangling Rope.

actions.name: Withering Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Entangling Rope (Requires Magic Rope)
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature the erinyes can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Force damage, and the target has the Restrained condition until the rope is destroyed, the erinyes uses a Bonus Action to release the target, or the erinyes uses Entangling Rope again.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

name: Githzerai Psion

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The githzerai makes three Psychic Warp attacks.

actions.name: Psychic Warp
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 26 (4d10 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the githzerai's choice of (A) the Charmed condition until the start of the githzerai's next turn or (B) the Prone condition, provided the target is a Large or smaller creature.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

reactions.name: Psionic Defense
reactions.description: The githzerai casts Feather Fall or Shield in response to the spell's trigger, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: These powerful psions oversee githzerai sanctuaries, study enigmatic planar events, and lead rrakkma--hostile forays into mind flayer colonies to slay illithids and uncover secrets of how the ancient gith were transformed.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Sleep Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast *Scorching Ray*.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d10 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 45 (10d8) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Sleep Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save. *Second Failure:* The target has the Unconscious condition for 10 minutes. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Minor Illusion*, *Scorching Ray*, *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell), *Speak with Animals*
**1/Day Each:** *Detect Thoughts*, *Control Weather*

actions.name: Blazing Light
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Scorching Ray*.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Scorching Sands
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 27 (6d8) Fire damage, and the target's Speed is halved until the end of its next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Sleep Sand
actions.description: A strong wind blows around the dragon. Each creature within 60 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from the dragon and knocked prone.

actions.name: Heat Wave
actions.description: Sand erupts in a 20-foot-radius sphere at a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. Each creature in the sphere must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Sand Wall
actions.description: A wall of sand erupts from a surface the dragon can see within 120 feet, forming a line up to 30 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick. It blocks line of sight.

effects.name: Dust Storms
effects.description: Dust storms frequently occur in the area within 6 miles of the lair.

effects.name: Mirages
effects.description: Mirages appear in the desert within 6 miles of the lair, confusing travelers. Navigation checks are made with disadvantage.

effects.name: Warm Winds
effects.description: Warm, gentle winds blow within 6 miles of the lair, keeping the temperature comfortable despite the desert setting.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

traits.name: Ice Walk
traits.description: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, Difficult Terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 19, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 54 (12d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Freezing Burst
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 7 (2d6) Cold damage, and the target's Speed is 0 until the end of the target's next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: The dragon casts *Fear*, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14). The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Freezing Fog
actions.description: Freezing fog fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. The fog spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. Each creature in the fog when it appears must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Moving through the fog costs 2 extra feet for every 1 foot moved.

actions.name: Ice Wall
actions.description: Jagged ice erupts from a solid surface within 120 feet of the dragon, forming a wall. The wall is up to 30 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick. Each creature in the wall's space is pushed to the outside and must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Slick
actions.description: The dragon creates an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 120 feet. The wall is up to 30 feet long, 1 foot thick, and 10 feet high. Each creature in the wall's space is pushed to either side (dragon's choice). A creature can make a DC 15 Strength check to break through the wall.

effects.name: Chilling Fog
effects.description: Freezing precipitation falls within 1 mile of the lair, sometimes forming blizzard conditions.

effects.name: Icy Surfaces
effects.description: Icy walls and floors are found within the lair. Floors are difficult terrain, and creatures that fall prone on them must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or spend their whole turn trying to stand up.

effects.name: Frigid Water
effects.description: Frigid water within 1 mile of the lair is supernaturally cold. A creature without Cold resistance that enters the water takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

name: Beholder

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the beholder fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The beholder uses Eye Rays three times.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The beholder randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll 1d10; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn):

actions.name: Chomp
actions.description: The beholder makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Glare
actions.description: The beholder uses Eye Rays.

description: A beholder is a floating orb of flesh with a central eye and a large mouth. Its smaller eyes, perched on stalks, each produce a different magical effect. Xenophobic and paranoid, a beholder is a tyrant that dominates lesser creatures.

effects.name: Scopophobia
effects.description: Creatures within 1 mile of the lair feel as if they're being watched. Any creature (excluding the beholder and its allies) that finishes a Short Rest while within 1 mile of the lair must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or gain no benefit from that rest.

effects.name: Warping Terrain
effects.description: Minor warps in reality occur near the lair; any creature (excluding the beholder) within 1 mile of the lair that makes a D20 Test and rolls a 1 has the Prone condition.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the beholder dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

bonusActions.name: Antimagic Cone
bonusActions.description: The beholder's central eye emits an antimagic wave in a 150-foot Cone. Until the start of the beholder's next turn, that area acts as an Antimagic Field spell, and that area works against the beholder's own Eye Rays.

name: Nalfeshnee

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the nalfeshnee dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The nalfeshnee has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The nalfeshnee makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Force damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The nalfeshnee teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

bonusActions.name: Horror Nimbus
bonusActions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the nalfeshnee. Failure: 28 (8d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition for 1 minute, until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the nalfeshnee out of line of sight. Success: The target is immune to this nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Pursuit
reactions.description: Trigger: Another creature the nalfeshnee can see ends its move within 120 feet of the nalfeshnee. Response: The nalfeshnee uses Teleport, but its destination space must be within 10 feet of the triggering creature.

description: Nalfeshnees seek to dominate all they encounter. Hulking and grotesque, these demons combine misshapen, bestial features with ogre-like frames.

name: Rakshasa
vulnerabilities: Piercing damage from weapons wielded by creatures under the effect of a *Bless* spell

traits.name: Greater Magic Resistance
traits.description: The rakshasa automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and the attack rolls of spells automatically miss it. Without the rakshasa's permission, no spell can observe the rakshasa remotely or detect its thoughts, creature type, or alignment.

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the rakshasa dies outside the Nine Hells, its body turns to ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The rakshasa makes three Cursed Touch attacks.

actions.name: Cursed Touch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 19 (3d12) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target gains no benefit from finishing a Short or Long Rest.

actions.name: Baleful Command
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 18, each enemy in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the rakshasa. *Failure:* 28 (8d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened and Incapacitated conditions until the start of the rakshasa's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The rakshasa casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Detect Thoughts*, *Disguise Self*, *Mage Hand*, *Minor Illusion*
**1/Day Each:** *Fly*, *Invisibility*, *Major Image*, *Plane Shift*

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shadow Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 35 (10d6) Necrotic damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies, and a Shadow rises from the corpse. The shadow is under the dragon's control and shares the dragon's Initiative count but acts immediately after the dragon.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Living Shadow
traits.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the dragon has Resistance to damage that isn't Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the dragon has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the dragon takes the Hide action.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Veil of Shadow
actions.description: The dragon uses Shadow Stealth, and one creature of its choice that it can see within 10 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The giant can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Storm Sword or Thunderbolt in any combination.

actions.name: Storm Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 23 (4d6 + 9) Slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Thunderbolt
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +14, range 500 ft. *Hit:* 22 (2d12 + 9) Lightning damage, and the target has the Blinded and Deafened conditions until the start of the giant's next turn.

actions.name: Lightning Storm
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder originating from a point the giant can see within 500 feet. *Failure:* 55 (10d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The giant casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Light*
**1/Day:** *Control Weather*

name: Ultroloth

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the ultroloth dies outside Gehenna, it revives there instantly.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ultroloth uses Hypnotic Gaze and makes two Mercurial Whip attacks.
multiattackActions: ultroloth uses Hypnotic Gaze and makes two Mercurial Whip

actions.name: Mercurial Whip
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 25 (6d6 + 4) Force damage, and the ultroloth can teleport the target up to 10 feet to an unoccupied space the ultroloth can see that isn't in the air.

actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the start of the ultroloth's next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this ultroloth's Hypnotic Gaze for 24 hours.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The ultroloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

bonusActions.name: Fiendish Guile
bonusActions.description: Casts Dispel Magic, Invisibility (self), Misty Step, or Suggestion.

description: Ultroloths manipulate mortals and yugoloths alike, seeking to hoard power and spread suffering.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Misty Escape
traits.description: If the vampire drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the vampire uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed. While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can't return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the Paralyzed condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weakness
traits.description: The vampire has these weaknesses: Forbiddance (can't enter a residence without invitation), Running Water (takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water), Stake to the Heart (Paralyzed while weapon is in heart while Incapacitated in resting place), Sunlight (takes 20 Radiant damage at start of turn in sunlight, Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks).

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: The vampire makes two Grave Strike attacks and uses Bite.

actions.name: Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of two hands.

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition. *Failure:* 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount. A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage and then buried rises the following sunset as a **Vampire Spawn** under the vampire's control.

actions.name: Beguile
actions.description: The vampire casts Command, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17). The vampire can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Deathless Strike
actions.description: The vampire moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Grave Strike attack.

effects.name: Children of the Night
effects.description: From dusk until dawn, Medium or smaller Beasts have the Charmed condition while within 1 mile of the lair.

effects.name: Looming Shadows
effects.description: Shadows within 1 mile seem to move as if alive. Any creature (excluding the vampire and its allies) that finishes a Short Rest within 1 mile must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or gain no benefit from that rest.

effects.name: Mists
effects.description: The area within 1 mile is Lightly Obscured by persistent, creeping fog. The vampire and any creatures of its choice are unaffected.

regionalEffects.endCondition: These lair effects end immediately if the vampire dies or moves its lair elsewhere.

bonusActions.name: Charm
bonusActions.description: The vampire casts *Charm Person*, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17), and the duration is 24 hours. The Charmed target is a willing recipient of the vampire's Bite, the damage of which doesn't end the spell. When the spell ends, the target is unaware it was Charmed by the vampire.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it shape-shifts into a Tiny bat (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 30 ft.) or a Medium cloud of mist (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 20 ft. [hover]), or it returns to its vampire form. Anything it is wearing transforms with it.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Melf's Acid Arrow* (level 3 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 54 (12d8) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Fear*, *Melf's Acid Arrow* (level 3 version)
**1/Day Each:** *Speak with Dead*, *Vitriolic Sphere*

actions.name: Cloud of Insects
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 22 (4d10) Poison damage, and the target has Disadvantage on saving throws to maintain Concentration until the end of its next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Fear*. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Darkness
actions.description: Pools of water the dragon can see within 120 feet surge outward in a grasping tide. Each creature on the ground within 20 feet of such a pool must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 20 feet into the water and knocked prone.

actions.name: Insects
actions.description: A cloud of swarming insects fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the dragon chooses within 120 feet. The cloud spreads around corners and remains until the dragon dismisses it, uses this lair action again, or dies. The cloud is lightly obscured. Any creature in the cloud when it appears must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

actions.name: Fog
actions.description: Magical darkness spreads from a point the dragon chooses within 60 feet, filling a 15-foot-radius sphere. Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness. It lasts until the dragon uses this action again or dies.

effects.name: Foul Water
effects.description: Water sources within 1 mile are supernaturally fouled. Enemies of the dragon that drink such water regurgitate it within minutes.

effects.name: Persistent Fog
effects.description: Fog lightly obscures the land within 6 miles of the lair.

effects.name: Wildlife Flees
effects.description: The land within 6 miles of the lair takes twice as long as normal to traverse since the foliage grows thick and grasping, and swamps become soggy and unsafe.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Slowing Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast *Mind Spike* (level 4 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d10 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 54 (12d8) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Slowing Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target can't take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Mind Spike* (level 4 version), *Minor Illusion*, *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Greater Restoration*, *Major Image*

actions.name: Giggling Magic
actions.description: *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature the dragon can see within 90 feet. *Failure:* 24 (7d6) Psychic damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target rolls 1d6 whenever it makes an ability check or attack roll and subtracts the number rolled from the D20 Test. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Mind Jolt
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Mind Spike* (level 4 version). The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Mud Slick
actions.description: The dragon chooses a point on the ground that it can see within 120 feet. Stone spikes erupt, creating a 20-foot-radius area of difficult terrain. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rockfall
actions.description: The dragon causes a section of cliff or ceiling to collapse above a creature that it can see within 120 feet. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone and buried. A buried creature is restrained and must succeed on a DC 15 Athletics check to dig itself free.

actions.name: Stone Spikes
actions.description: The dragon chooses a 10-foot-square area on the ground that it can see within 120 feet. The ground turns to mud 3 feet deep. Each creature on the ground in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or sink and be restrained. A creature can use its action to try to free itself with a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check.

effects.name: Talking Animals
effects.description: Intelligent beings within 1 mile of the dragon's lair are prone to fits of giggling or uncontrollable laughter.

effects.name: Fool's Gold
effects.description: Small gems and veins of precious metal appear in rock formations within 6 miles of the lair, but they are illusory.

effects.name: Tunnels
effects.description: The land within 6 miles of the lair is riddled with natural tunnels and passages created by the dragon's burrowing.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

name: Death Tyrant

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the death tyrant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The death tyrant uses Eye Rays three times.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 feet. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The death tyrant randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll 1d10; reroll if the death tyrant has already used that ray during this turn):

actions.name: Chomp
actions.description: The death tyrant makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Glare
actions.description: The death tyrant uses Eye Rays.

description: A death tyrant is a beholder that has been transformed into an Undead creature, retaining its eye ray powers and gaining the ability to animate dead. Even more paranoid and tyrannical than living beholders.

actions.name: Negative Energy
actions.description: An area of ground within 120 feet becomes a 60-foot-radius pool of negative energy. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

actions.name: Darkness Zone
actions.description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of magical darkness extends from a point the death tyrant chooses within 120 feet. Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the darkness overlaps with an area illuminated by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

actions.name: Undead Grasp
actions.description: The death tyrant targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. A crackling cord of negative energy tethers the death tyrant to the target. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or the death tyrant drains 10 (3d6) HP from the target.

effects.name: Undead Rising
effects.description: Creatures within 1 mile of the death tyrant's lair sometimes hear faint whispers or see fleeting shadows.

effects.name: Blighted Land
effects.description: The area within 1 mile of the lair is tainted by the death tyrant's presence. Vegetation withers, and small animals flee.

effects.name: Necromantic Fog
effects.description: A creature that dies within 1 mile of the lair has a 10% chance of rising as a zombie 24 hours later.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the death tyrant is destroyed, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

bonusActions.name: Negative Energy Cone
bonusActions.description: The death tyrant's central eye emits an imperceptible, magical wave of negative energy in a 150-foot Cone. Creatures in that area can't regain Hit Points until the start of the death tyrant's next turn. An intact Humanoid corpse there instantly rises as a **Zombie** under the death tyrant's control and takes its turn immediately after the death tyrant on the same initiative count.

name: Flesh Colossus
languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the colossus is subjected to Lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Berserk
traits.description: Whenever the colossus starts its turn with 100 Hit Points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the colossus goes berserk. It attacks the nearest creature it can see. Once berserk, it continues until it is destroyed or regains all its Hit Points.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The colossus has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The colossus makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach 10 ft. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Storm (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The colossus unleashes lightning in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) Lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Flesh colossi are horrifying constructs stitched together from the remains of many creatures, animated by lightning.

name: Ice Devil

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes three Ice Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a Tail attack.

actions.name: Ice Spear
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +10, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Cold damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target can't take a Bonus Action or Reaction, its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and it can move or take one action on its turn, not both. Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the devil's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) Cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Wall
actions.description: The devil casts Wall of Ice (level 8 version), requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17).

description: Heartless strategists of the Nine Hells, ice devils forsake emotion to indulge in their own malicious interpretations of logic. For them, the multiverse is a puzzle that must be solved to benefit them, their masters, and the Nine Hells.

name: Stone Colossus
languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The colossus has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The colossus's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The colossus makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach 10 ft. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The colossus targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or have the Slowed condition for 1 minute. A slowed target's speed is halved, it takes a -2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't use Reactions. On its turn, it can use either an Action or a Bonus Action, not both. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

description: Stone colossi are massive constructs carved from solid rock, animated by powerful transmutation magic.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Repulsion Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast *Guiding Bolt* (level 2 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +12, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d8 + 7) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 19, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 55 (10d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Repulsion Breath
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 19, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target is pushed up to 60 feet straight away from the dragon and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17, +10 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Guiding Bolt* (level 2 version), *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell), *Speak with Animals*, *Thaumaturgy*
**1/Day Each:** *Detect Thoughts*, *Water Breathing*

actions.name: Guiding Light
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Guiding Bolt* (level 2 version).

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Thunderclap
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 90 feet. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Thunder damage, and the target has the Deafened condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Fog Cloud
actions.description: The dragon creates fog as if it had cast the Fog Cloud spell. The fog lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round.

actions.name: Thunderclap
actions.description: A thunderclap originates at a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. Each creature within a 20-foot radius must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (1d10) thunder damage and be deafened until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Tidal Wave
actions.description: A 10-foot-wide, 20-foot-long, 10-foot-tall wave of water crashes down on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

effects.name: Underwater Currents
effects.description: Once per day, the dragon can alter the weather in a 6-mile radius centered on its lair, as if it had cast the Control Weather spell.

effects.name: Safe Harbor
effects.description: Underwater plants within 6 miles of the lair take on dazzlingly brilliant hues.

effects.name: Sea Life
effects.description: Within its lair, the dragon can set illusory sounds, such as soft music and strange echoes, originating from a point it can perceive within 120 feet.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, changed weather reverts to normal, and other effects fade over 1d10 days.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Mind Spike* (level 3 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 56 (16d6) Poison damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Mind Spike* (level 3 version)
**1/Day:** *Geas*

actions.name: Mind Invasion
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Mind Spike* (level 3 version).

actions.name: Noxious Miasma
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 90 feet. *Failure:* 7 (2d6) Poison damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of its next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Grasping Roots
actions.description: Grasping roots and vines erupt in a 20-foot radius centered on a point on the ground the dragon can see within 120 feet. That area becomes difficult terrain, and each creature there must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be restrained by the roots and vines until the dragon uses this action again or dies.

actions.name: Charming Fog
actions.description: A wall of tangled brush bristling with thorns springs into existence on a solid surface within 120 feet. The wall is up to 60 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick, and it blocks line of sight. Each creature in the wall's space must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

actions.name: Magical Fog
actions.description: Magical fog billows around one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the dragon until initiative count 20 on the next round.

effects.name: Thickets
effects.description: Thickets form labyrinthine passages within 1 mile of the lair. The thickets act as 10-foot-high, 10-foot-thick walls that block line of sight.

effects.name: Plant Growth
effects.description: Within 1 mile of its lair, the dragon can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

effects.name: Mind Fog
effects.description: Rodents and birds within 1 mile of the lair serve as the dragon's eyes and ears.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, the thickets remain but are no longer considered difficult terrain, and other effects fade over 1d10 days.

name: Mummy Lord
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the mummy fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The mummy has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If destroyed, the mummy gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the mummy's lair. The heart is a Tiny object that has AC 17, HP 10, and Immunity to all damage except Fire.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mummy makes one Rotting Fist or Channel Negative Energy attack, and it uses Dreadful Glare.
multiattackActions: mummy makes one Rotting Fist or Channel Negative Energy

actions.name: Rotting Fist
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, it gains no benefit from finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

actions.name: Channel Negative Energy
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 25 (6d6 + 4) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature the mummy can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 25 (6d6 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the *Paralyzed* condition until the end of the mummy's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The mummy casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Dispel Magic*, *Thaumaturgy*
**1/Day Each:** *Animate Dead*, *Harm*, *Insect Plague* (level 7 version)

actions.name: Dread Command
actions.description: The mummy casts *Command* (level 2 version), using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. The mummy can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Glare
actions.description: The mummy uses Dreadful Glare. The mummy can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Necrotic Strike
actions.description: The mummy makes one Rotting Fist or Channel Negative Energy attack.

description: A mummy lord is a powerful undead pharaoh or priest-king, preserved through dark rituals. It commands legions of lesser mummies and wields devastating divine magic.

actions.name: Sandstorm
actions.description: Each undead in the lair can pinpoint the location of each living creature within 120 feet as though it had blindsight.

actions.name: Cursed Dust
actions.description: A cloud of sand swirls in a 20-foot-radius sphere at a point the mummy lord can see within 120 feet. Each creature in the cloud must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Undead Rally
actions.description: Each undead ally within 60 feet of the mummy lord gains 10 temporary hit points.

effects.name: Dessication
effects.description: Food brought within 1 mile of the lair instantly molders and spoils.

effects.name: Sandstorms
effects.description: Sandstorms rage within 6 miles of the lair.

effects.name: Undead
effects.description: Undead within 1 mile of the lair have advantage on saving throws against features that turn Undead.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the mummy lord is destroyed, these effects end immediately.

reactions.name: Whirlwind of Sand
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The mummy is hit by an attack roll. *Response:* The mummy adds 2 to its AC against the attack, possibly causing the attack to miss, and the mummy teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Each creature of its choice that it can see within 5 feet of its destination space has the *Blinded* condition until the end of the mummy's next turn.

name: Purple Worm

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.description: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The worm makes one Bite attack and one Tail Stinger attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 22 (3d8 + 9) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 19), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Tail Stinger
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d6 + 9) Piercing damage plus 35 (10d6) Poison damage.

description: Purple worms are enormous burrowing predators that tunnel through rock and earth, consuming everything in their path. They are among the most feared creatures of the Underdark.

bonusActions.name: Swallow
bonusActions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 19, one Large or smaller creature Grappled by the worm (it can have up to three creatures swallowed at a time). *Failure:* The target is swallowed by the worm, and the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 17 (5d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

name: Salamander Inferno Master

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the salamander's turns, each creature of the salamander's choice in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the salamander takes 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The salamander has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The salamander makes two Flame Trident attacks.

actions.name: Flame Trident
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +12, reach 5 ft. or range 30/90 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d8 + 7) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Fire damage. *Hit or Miss:* The trident magically returns to the salamander's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Inferno Blast
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 30-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the salamander can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 35 (10d6) Fire damage, and the target starts burning, taking 5 (1d10) Fire damage at the start of each of its turns instead of the normal burning damage. The target gains 1 Exhaustion level whenever it takes this burning damage. *Success:* Half damage only.

bonusActions.name: Blazing Movement
bonusActions.description: The salamander moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. During this movement, fire fills a 5-foot Emanation originating from the salamander. When the Emanation enters a creature's space, that creature takes 7 (2d6) Fire damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

description: Serpentine Artists of the Inferno. Salamander inferno masters are ancient connoisseurs of flames.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The vampire makes two attacks, using Grave Strike or Sickening Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Grave Strike
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d8 + 5) Slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Sickening Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d10 + 5) Necrotic damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the vampire's next turn.

actions.name: Hunger of Hadar
actions.description: The vampire casts *Hunger of Hadar* (level 5 version), requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18).

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Shadow Escape
traits.description: If the vampire drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, it teleports into its resting place unless it is in running water or sunlight. If it can't teleport, it is destroyed. Once inside its resting place, it has the Paralyzed condition for 1 hour, after which it regains 1 Hit Point.

traits.name: Vampire Weakness
traits.description: The vampire has these weaknesses:

bonusActions.name: Sanguine Drain
bonusActions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 18, one creature the vampire can see within 30 feet that isn't a Construct or an Undead. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

actions.name: Beguile
actions.description: The vampire casts *Command*, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18). The vampire can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Umbral Strike
actions.description: The vampire moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Grave Strike or Sickening Ray attack.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Shatter*.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +12, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d8 + 7) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 19, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 60 (11d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Invisibility*, *Mage Hand*, *Shatter*
**1/Day Each:** *Scrying*, *Sending*

actions.name: Cloaked Flight
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Invisibility* on itself, and it can fly up to half its Fly Speed. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Sonic Boom
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Shatter*. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Tail Swipe
actions.description: The dragon makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Thunderclap
actions.description: Part of the ceiling in the lair collapses. Each creature within a 20-foot-radius of a point the dragon chooses within 120 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Sand Vortex
actions.description: A cloud of sand swirls about in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the dragon chooses within 120 feet. The cloud spreads around corners. Each creature in the cloud must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the blindness on a success.

actions.name: Lightning Arc
actions.description: Lightning arcs, forming a 5-foot-wide line between two points the dragon can see within 120 feet. Each creature in the line must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

effects.name: Thunderstorms
effects.description: Thunderstorms rage within 6 miles of the lair.

effects.name: Dust Devils
effects.description: Dust devils scour the land within 6 miles of the lair. A dust devil has the statistics of an air elemental, but it can't fly, has Intelligence and Charisma of 1, and doesn't have the Whirlwind action.

effects.name: Hidden Sinkholes
effects.description: Hidden sinkholes form in the lair's area. A creature on the ground that traverses the area must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check or sink 1d6 feet into the sinkhole.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, the dust devils disappear immediately, and thunderstorms abate within 1d10 days.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Paralyzing Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast *Ice Knife*.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +13, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d8 + 8) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 20, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 54 (12d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 20, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *First Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save. *Second Failure:* The target has the Paralyzed condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Hold Monster*, *Ice Knife*, *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Ice Storm* (level 5 version), *Zone of Truth*

actions.name: Chill
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Hold Monster*. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Cold Gale
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 19, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Cold damage, and the target is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the dragon. *Success:* Half damage only. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Fog
actions.description: The dragon creates fog as though it had cast the Fog Cloud spell. The fog lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round.

actions.name: Icy Wind
actions.description: A blisteringly cold wind blasts through the lair. Each creature within 120 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (1d10) cold damage. Gases and vapors are dispersed, and unprotected flames are extinguished.

actions.name: Wall of Ice
actions.description: A wall of ice springs from a surface within 120 feet. The wall is 60 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick. Breaking through requires a DC 15 Strength check. A creature takes 10 (3d6) cold damage from touching the wall.

effects.name: Peaceful Aura
effects.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, winds buoy non-evil creatures that fall due to no act of the dragon or its allies. Such creatures descend at a rate of 60 feet per round and take no falling damage.

effects.name: Winter Weather
effects.description: Once per day, the dragon can alter the weather in a 6-mile radius, as if it had cast Control Weather.

effects.name: Safe Shelter
effects.description: Within its lair, the dragon can set illusory sounds, such as soft music and strange echoes.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, changed weather reverts to normal, and other effects fade over 1d10 days.

name: Githyanki Dracomancer

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The githyanki makes three Draconic Strike attacks.

actions.name: Draconic Strike
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) Fire damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the start of the githyanki's next turn.

actions.name: Conjured Dragon's Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. *Failure:* 27 (6d8) Fire damage plus 27 (6d8) Force damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks):

bonusActions.name: Misty Step
bonusActions.description: The githyanki casts *Misty Step*, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Githyanki dracomancers uphold the ancient pact between the githyanki and the Dragon Queen's red dragon consort, Ephelomon, cultivating magic talents that complement the might of red dragons.

traits.name: Blight Seeds
traits.description: When it finishes a Long Rest, the blight expels 1d6 seeds into unoccupied spaces on the ground within 30 feet of itself. After 24 hours, the seeds become creatures under the blight's control. Roll 1d8 for each seed to determine the creature it becomes: on 1-4, Twig Blight; on 5-6, Needle Blight; on 7-8, Vine Blight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The blight makes two attacks, using Slam or Thorn Volley in any combination. It also uses Life-Draining Root.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +12, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 25 (4d8 + 7) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Thorn Volley
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +12, range 60/180 ft. *Hit:* 20 (3d8 + 7) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Life-Draining Root
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 20, one Huge or smaller creature the blight can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* 14 (2d6 + 7) Necrotic damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 17) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target has the Restrained condition and takes 14 (4d6) Necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the blight regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

name: Iron Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't Adamantine

traits.name: Fire Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to Fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Fire damage dealt.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The golem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The golem makes two attacks, using Bladed Arm or Fiery Bolt in any combination.

actions.name: Bladed Arm
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +12, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 20 (3d8 + 7) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fiery Bolt
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 36 (8d8) Fire damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 55 (10d10) Poison damage. *Success:* Half damage.

description: Iron golems are massive constructs of solid iron, among the most powerful golems ever created.

name: Marilith

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the marilith dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The marilith has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Reactive
traits.description: The marilith can take one Reaction on every turn of combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The marilith makes six Pact Blade attacks and uses Constrict.

actions.name: Pact Blade
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, one Medium or smaller creature the marilith can see within 5 feet. Failure: 15 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: The marilith teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: Trigger: The marilith is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The marilith adds 5 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

description: Mariliths are six-armed, serpentlike demons that wield lethal, Abyss-forged blades. With these cursed weapons and experience from countless battles, they lead other demons to slaughter virtuous souls.

name: Planetar

traits.name: Divine Awareness
traits.description: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

traits.name: Exalted Restoration
traits.description: If the planetar dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The planetar has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The planetar makes three Radiant Sword attacks or uses Holy Burst twice.

actions.name: Radiant Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +12, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Holy Burst
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 20, each enemy in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the planetar can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 24 (7d6) Radiant damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The planetar casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*
**1/Day Each:** *Commune*, *Control Weather*, *Dispel Evil and Good*, *Raise Dead*

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The planetar casts *Cure Wounds*, *Invisibility*, *Lesser Restoration*, or *Remove Curse*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

description: Righteously Wrathful Angelic Warrior. Planetars deliver the punishment of righteous gods.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Spellcasting to cast *Guiding Bolt* (level 2 version) or (B) Weakening Breath.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d8 + 8) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 21, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 66 (12d10) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 21):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Guiding Bolt* (level 2 version), *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Flame Strike*, *Zone of Truth*

actions.name: Weakening Breath
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 21, each creature that isn't currently affected by this breath in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Tests and subtracts 3 (1d6) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Banish
actions.description: *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 21, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Force damage, and the target has the Incapacitated condition and is transported to a harmless demiplane until the start of the dragon's next turn, at which point it reappears in an unoccupied space of the dragon's choice within 120 feet of the dragon. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Guiding Light
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Guiding Bolt* (level 2 version).

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Banishment
actions.description: The dragon glimpses the future, so it has advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until initiative count 20 on the next round.

actions.name: Lava Burst
actions.description: One creature the dragon can see within 120 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be banished to a dream plane, a different plane of existence the dragon has visited. To escape, the creature must use its action to make a DC 15 Charisma check. On a success, the creature escapes the dream plane.

actions.name: Healing Aura
actions.description: The dragon creates a shimmering wall of golden light. The wall is 40 feet long, 10 feet high, and 1 foot thick and appears in a space the dragon can see within 120 feet. Nonmagical flames in the wall's space are extinguished. A creature that enters the wall for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

effects.name: Gentle Mist
effects.description: Whenever a creature that can understand a language sleeps or enters a state of trance or reverie within 6 miles of the lair, the dragon can establish telepathic contact with that creature and converse.

effects.name: Precious Gems
effects.description: Banks of beautiful, opalescent mist manifest within 6 miles of the lair. The mist doesn't obscure anything. It takes eerie shapes when evil creatures are near the dragon or its allies.

effects.name: Luck
effects.description: Gems and pearls within 1 mile of the lair sparkle and gleam, shedding dim light in a 5-foot radius.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects end immediately.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Scorching Ray*.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 13 (1d10 + 8) Slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 21, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 59 (17d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Command* (level 2 version), *Detect Magic*, *Scorching Ray*
**1/Day:** *Fireball*

actions.name: Commanding Presence
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Command* (level 2 version). The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Fiery Rays
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Scorching Ray*. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

effects.name: Burning Heat
effects.description: Creatures within 1 mile of the lair that have the Burning condition take an extra 1d4 Fire damage at the start of each of their turns.

effects.name: Smoldering Haze
effects.description: The area within 1 mile of the lair is lightly obscured by smoke and haze. A creature that starts its turn in this area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

name: Androsphinx

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.description: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any Divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the sphinx fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sphinx makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +12, reach 5 ft. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Roar (3/Day)
actions.description:
The sphinx emits a magical roar. Each time it roars before finishing a Long Rest, the roar is louder and the effect is different. Each creature within 500 feet and able to hear the roar must make a saving throw.

First Roar: DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition for 1 minute. A Frightened target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

Second Roar: DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened and Deafened conditions for 1 minute. A Frightened target has the Paralyzed condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

Third Roar: Each creature makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 44 (8d10) Thunder damage and has the Prone condition. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Claw Attack
actions.description: The sphinx makes one Claw attack.

actions.name: Teleport (2 Actions)
actions.description: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Cast a Spell (3 Actions)
actions.description: The sphinx uses Spellcasting.

description: An androsphinx is a celestial guardian with the body of a lion and the head of a man. Its roars carry devastating magical power, and it watches over sacred places with unwavering devotion.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The flow of time is altered such that every creature in the lair must reroll initiative. The sphinx can choose not to reroll.

actions.name: Time Shift
actions.description: The lair fills with a magical miasma that affects all creatures other than the sphinx. Each such creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be affected by the Slow spell for 1 minute.

actions.name: Aging
actions.description: The sphinx shifts itself and up to seven other creatures it can see in its lair to another plane of existence.

effects.name: Time Anomalies
effects.description: The region within 1 mile of the sphinx's lair is altered by the creature's presence, creating one or more of these effects: a time anomaly that causes creatures to age or de-age while in the area.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the sphinx dies, these effects end immediately.

name: Death Knight

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the death knight fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The death knight has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Marshal Undead
traits.description: Undead creatures of the death knight's choice (excluding itself) in a 60-foot Emanation originating from it have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the death knight is destroyed before it atones for its evil, it gains a new body in 1d10 days, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in a location significant to the death knight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The death knight makes three Dread Blade attacks.
multiattackActions: death knight makes three Dread Blade

actions.name: Dread Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Hellfire Orb
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 20-foot-radius *Sphere* centered on a point the death knight can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 35 (10d6) Fire damage plus 35 (10d6) Necrotic damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The death knight casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):
**At Will:** *Command*, *Phantom Steed*
**2/Day:** *Destructive Wave* (Necrotic), *Dispel Magic*

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: Trigger: The death knight is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

description: A death knight is the undead remnant of a paladin or other warrior who broke their sacred oath. Cursed to eternal unlife, death knights command legions of undead and wield devastating necrotic power.

actions.name: Dread Authority
actions.description: The death knight uses Spellcasting to cast Command. The death knight can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Fell Word
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature the death knight can see within 120 feet. Failure: 17 (5d6) Necrotic damage, and the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken. The death knight can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Lunge
