actions.description: The death knight moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Dread Blade attack.

name: Dracolich

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Life Suppression
traits.description: Creatures within 60 feet of the dracolich can't regain Hit Points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The dracolich has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Gem
traits.description: The dracolich has a magical gem. If the dracolich is destroyed while the gem is on the same plane of existence as it, the dracolich gains a new body in 1d20 days, regaining all its Hit Points and appearing within 5 feet of the gem.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dracolich makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Ray of Sickness* (level 2 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +13, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d10 + 7) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 20, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 52 (8d12) Necrotic damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The dracolich casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks):

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dracolich moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Sickening Ray
actions.description: The dracolich uses Spellcasting to cast *Ray of Sickness* (level 2 version). The dracolich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Terrifying Presence
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 19, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the dracolich. *Failure:* 11 (2d10) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the end of its next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dracolich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

description: A dracolich is an undead dragon, usually created through dark rituals. It retains its draconic power but is animated by necrotic energy.

actions.name: Necrotic Eruption
actions.description: Necrotic energy erupts from a point the dracolich can see within 120 feet. Each creature within 20 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Tremor
actions.description: A tremor shakes the lair in a 60-foot radius around the dracolich. Each creature other than the dracolich on the ground in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Undead Rising
actions.description: The dracolich targets one corpse within 120 feet that it can see. The corpse rises as a zombie under the dracolich's control. The zombie takes its turn immediately after the dracolich.

effects.name: Blighted Land
effects.description: Vegetation within 1 mile of the lair withers, and the land becomes barren and lifeless.

effects.name: Undead Presence
effects.description: Undead within 1 mile of the lair have advantage on saving throws against features that turn Undead.

effects.name: Dread Aura
effects.description: Creatures within 1 mile of the lair that are sleeping experience nightmares.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dracolich is destroyed, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Bite attacks. It can replace one attack with a Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +13, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 23 (3d10 + 7) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Fire damage. Being underwater doesn't grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +13, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d10 + 7) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Steam Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 19, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 56 (16d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* Being underwater doesn't grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

name: Goristro

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the goristro dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The goristro has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The goristro makes one Brutal Gore attack and two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Brutal Gore
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach 10 ft. Hit: 40 (6d10 + 7) Piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the goristro and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach 10 ft. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) Bludgeoning damage.

bonusActions.name: Charge
bonusActions.description: The goristro moves up to half its Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

description: Terrifying in scale and overwhelming power, goristros are giant demons capable of bringing cities to ruin. These demons embody senseless anarchy and nihilistic destruction.

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.description: No magic can observe the sphinx remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the sphinx fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sphinx makes two Claw attacks and uses Roar.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +12, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 20 (4d6 + 6) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Roar
actions.description: The sphinx emits a magical roar. Whenever it roars, the roar has a different effect, as detailed below (the sequence resets when it takes a Long Rest):

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The sphinx casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):

actions.name: Arcane Prowl
actions.description: The sphinx can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one Claw attack.

actions.name: Weight of Years
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature the sphinx can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* The target gains 1 Exhaustion level. While the target has any Exhaustion levels, it appears 3d10 years older. *Failure or Success:* The sphinx can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

lairActions.description: The region containing a sphinx of valor's lair is altered by its presence, creating the following effects:

actions.name: Distant Sight
actions.description: While in its lair, the sphinx can cast Clairvoyance, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as its Spellcasting action. When cast this way, the spell's range is 1 mile.

actions.name: Infusion of Knowledge
actions.description: Whenever the sphinx or one of its allies takes a Study action while within 1 mile of the lair, it adds 1d6 to any ability check it makes for that action.

name: Demilich

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the demilich is destroyed, it reforms and regains all its Hit Points in 1d10 days unless a *Wish* spell is cast on its remains.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The demilich makes three Necrotic Burst attacks.

actions.name: Necrotic Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +11, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 24 (7d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Howl
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 19, each creature in a 30-foot *Emanation* originating from the demilich. *Failure:* 70 (20d6) Psychic damage. *Failure or Success:* The target has the *Frightened* condition until the start of the demilich's next turn.

actions.name: Energy Drain
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 19, one creature the demilich can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by 14 (4d6). *Failure or Success:* The demilich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Grave-Dust Flight
actions.description: The demilich flies up to its Fly Speed, shedding grave dust. Each creature within 5 feet of the demilich as it moves is targeted once by the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 19. *Failure:* The target has the *Blinded* condition until the end of the demilich's next turn. *Failure or Success:* The demilich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Necrosis
actions.description: The demilich makes one Necrotic Burst attack.

description: A demilich is the decayed remnant of a lich that has lost the will or ability to maintain its phylactery. Only a jeweled skull remains, still possessing devastating magical power.

actions.name: Soul Vortex
actions.description: The tomb fills with a swirling vortex of bone dust. Each creature in the lair must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and be unable to regain Hit Points until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Antimagic Field
actions.description: The demilich targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. An antimagic field fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target until initiative count 20 on the next round.

actions.name: Fear Aura
actions.description: The demilich creates a shimmering wall of bone 30 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick. A creature that moves through the wall takes 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

effects.name: Withered Land
effects.description: Creatures within 100 feet of the demilich's lair feel an overwhelming sense of despair and dread.

effects.name: Silence
effects.description: Magical wards prevent teleportation within 1 mile of the lair.

effects.name: Trapped Souls
effects.description: Undead within 1 mile of the lair have advantage on saving throws against features that turn Undead.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the demilich is destroyed, these effects fade over 10 days.

name: Iron Colossus
languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak
damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Fire Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the colossus is subjected to Fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Fire damage dealt.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The colossus has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The colossus's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The colossus makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +15, reach 10 ft. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The colossus exhales poisonous gas in a 60-foot Cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (13d6) Poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Iron colossi are massive constructs forged from solid iron, nearly impervious to mundane weapons.

name: Balor

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.description: The balor explodes when it dies. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 20, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the balor. Failure: 31 (9d6) Fire damage plus 31 (9d6) Force damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: If the balor dies outside the Abyss, it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the balor's turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the balor takes 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the balor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The balor has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The balor makes one Flame Whip attack and one Lightning Blade attack.

actions.name: Flame Whip
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 30 ft. *Hit:* 18 (3d6 + 8) Force damage plus 17 (5d6) Fire damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the balor pulls the target up to 25 feet straight toward itself, and the target has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Lightning Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 21 (3d8 + 8) Force damage plus 22 (4d10) Lightning damage, and the target can't take Reactions until the start of the balor's next turn.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: The balor teleports itself or a willing demon within 10 feet of itself up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space the balor can see.

description: Balors embody demons' ruinous fury and hatred. Towering, winged terrors, these demonic warlords seethe with wrath, their rage erupting in waves of fire and as a pair of vicious weapons: a sword of crackling lightning and a whip of lashing flames.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Sleep Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast *Scorching Ray* (level 3 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 19 (2d10 + 8) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 21, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 58 (13d8) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Sleep Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 21, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save. *Second Failure:* The target has the Unconscious condition for 10 minutes. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Minor Illusion*, *Scorching Ray* (level 3 version), *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell), *Speak with Animals*
**1/Day Each:** *Control Weather*, *Detect Thoughts*

actions.name: Blazing Light
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Scorching Ray* (level 3 version).

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Scorching Sands
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 20, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 36 (8d8) Fire damage, and the target's Speed is halved until the end of its next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Sleep Sand
actions.description: A strong wind blows around the dragon. Each creature within 60 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from the dragon and knocked prone.

actions.name: Heat Wave
actions.description: Sand erupts in a 20-foot-radius sphere at a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. Each creature in the sphere must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Sand Wall
actions.description: A wall of sand erupts from a surface the dragon can see within 120 feet, forming a line up to 30 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick. It blocks line of sight.

effects.name: Dust Storms
effects.description: Dust storms frequently occur in the area within 6 miles of the lair.

effects.name: Mirages
effects.description: Mirages appear in the desert within 6 miles of the lair, confusing travelers. Navigation checks are made with disadvantage.

effects.name: Warm Winds
effects.description: Warm, gentle winds blow within 6 miles of the lair, keeping the temperature comfortable despite the desert setting.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

traits.name: Ice Walk
traits.description: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, Difficult Terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d8 + 8) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 22, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. *Failure:* 63 (14d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Freezing Burst
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 20, each creature in a 30-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Cold damage, and the target's Speed is 0 until the end of the target's next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: The dragon casts *Fear*, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18). The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Freezing Fog
actions.description: Freezing fog fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. The fog spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. Each creature in the fog when it appears must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Moving through the fog costs 2 extra feet for every 1 foot moved.

actions.name: Ice Wall
actions.description: Jagged ice erupts from a solid surface within 120 feet of the dragon, forming a wall. The wall is up to 30 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick. Each creature in the wall's space is pushed to the outside and must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Slick
actions.description: The dragon creates an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 120 feet. The wall is up to 30 feet long, 1 foot thick, and 10 feet high. Each creature in the wall's space is pushed to either side (dragon's choice). A creature can make a DC 15 Strength check to break through the wall.

effects.name: Chilling Fog
effects.description: Freezing precipitation falls within 1 mile of the lair, sometimes forming blizzard conditions.

effects.name: Icy Surfaces
effects.description: Icy walls and floors are found within the lair. Floors are difficult terrain, and creatures that fall prone on them must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or spend their whole turn trying to stand up.

effects.name: Frigid Water
effects.description: Frigid water within 1 mile of the lair is supernaturally cold. A creature without Cold resistance that enters the water takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

name: Animal Lord

traits.name: Animal Lordship
traits.description: An animal lord represents a Forager, Hunter, or Sage (DM's choice), which determines certain traits in this stat block.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the animal lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Lordly Presence
traits.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 20, any enemy that starts its turn in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the animal lord. Failure: The target suffers one of the following effects: Captivated (Forager Only) - the target has the Charmed condition until the end of its next turn, while Charmed the target has the Incapacitated condition; Fearful (Hunter Only) - the target has the Frightened condition until the end of its next turn; Mired (Sage Only) - the target takes 10 (3d6) Psychic damage and is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn, subtracting 1d4 from its saving throws.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The animal lord has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The animal lord makes two attacks, using Rend or Radiant Ray in any combination, and uses Animal Spirit.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +13, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Force damage.

actions.name: Radiant Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +12, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 20 (4d6 + 6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Animal Spirit
actions.description: The animal lord conjures an animal spirit that strikes at a creature and then disappears. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 20, one creature the animal lord can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 28 (4d10 + 6) Radiant damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* One of the following effects occurs:

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The animal lord casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
**At Will:** *Animal Friendship*, *Animal Messenger*, *Speak with Animals*
**2/Day Each:** *Awaken*, *Greater Restoration*
**1/Day Each (Sage Only):** *Animal Shapes*, *Sunburst*

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The animal lord shape-shifts into a Huge or smaller version of the animal it represents or a Medium or Small Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

actions.name: Feral Strike
actions.description: The animal lord moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Radiant Strike
actions.description: The animal lord makes one Radiant Ray attack.

description: Immortal Regent of the Wild. Animal lords are the immortal spirits of legendary animals. They serve as the divine protectors of animals of their kind.

actions.name: Animal Surge
actions.description: The animal lord summons 1d4+1 beasts of CR 1 or lower that appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet. They act on the animal lord's initiative.

actions.name: Nature's Grasp
actions.description: Roots and vines erupt from the ground in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain, and each creature in it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be restrained.

actions.name: Primal Roar
actions.description: Each hostile creature within 60 feet must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

effects.name: Abundant Wildlife
effects.description: Within 3 miles of the lair, animals are unusually numerous and healthy.

effects.name: Nature's Shield
effects.description: Natural terrain within 1 mile of the lair is difficult terrain for the animal lord's enemies.

effects.name: Animal Sentinels
effects.description: The animal lord is always aware of intruders within 3 miles of its lair through animal sentinels.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the animal lord dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the pit fiend dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Fear Aura
traits.description: The pit fiend emanates an aura in a 20-foot Emanation while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 21, any enemy that starts its turn in the aura. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to this pit fiend's aura for 24 hours.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the pit fiend fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The pit fiend has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The pit fiend makes one Bite attack, two Devilish Claw attacks, and one Fiery Mace attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 18 (3d6 + 8) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make the following saving throw. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 21. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points and takes 21 (6d6) Poison damage at the start of each of its turns, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Devilish Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 26 (4d8 + 8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Fiery Mace
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d6 + 8) Force damage plus 21 (6d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Hellfire Spellcasting
actions.description: The pit fiend casts *Fireball* (level 5 version) twice, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 21). It can replace one *Fireball* with *Hold Monster* (level 7 version) or *Wall of Fire*.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Melf's Acid Arrow* (level 4 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +15, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d8 + 8) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 22, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 67 (15d8) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 21, +13 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Fear*, *Melf's Acid Arrow* (level 4 version)
**1/Day Each:** *Create Undead*, *Speak with Dead*, *Vitriolic Sphere* (level 5 version)

actions.name: Cloud of Insects
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 21, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 33 (6d10) Poison damage, and the target has Disadvantage on saving throws to maintain Concentration until the end of its next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Fear*. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Darkness
actions.description: Pools of water the dragon can see within 120 feet surge outward in a grasping tide. Each creature on the ground within 20 feet of such a pool must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 20 feet into the water and knocked prone.

actions.name: Insects
actions.description: A cloud of swarming insects fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the dragon chooses within 120 feet. The cloud spreads around corners and remains until the dragon dismisses it, uses this lair action again, or dies. The cloud is lightly obscured. Any creature in the cloud when it appears must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

actions.name: Fog
actions.description: Magical darkness spreads from a point the dragon chooses within 60 feet, filling a 15-foot-radius sphere. Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness. It lasts until the dragon uses this action again or dies.

effects.name: Foul Water
effects.description: Water sources within 1 mile are supernaturally fouled. Enemies of the dragon that drink such water regurgitate it within minutes.

effects.name: Persistent Fog
effects.description: Fog lightly obscures the land within 6 miles of the lair.

effects.name: Wildlife Flees
effects.description: The land within 6 miles of the lair takes twice as long as normal to traverse since the foliage grows thick and grasping, and swamps become soggy and unsafe.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Slowing Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast *Mind Spike* (level 5 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +15, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 19 (2d10 + 8) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 22, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 63 (14d8) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Slowing Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 22, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target can't take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 21):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Mind Spike* (level 5 version), *Minor Illusion*, *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Greater Restoration*, *Major Image*, *Project Image*

actions.name: Giggling Magic
actions.description: *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 21, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 31 (9d6) Psychic damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target rolls 1d8 whenever it makes an ability check or attack roll and subtracts the number rolled from the D20 Test. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Mind Jolt
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Mind Spike* (level 5 version). The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Mud Slick
actions.description: The dragon chooses a point on the ground that it can see within 120 feet. Stone spikes erupt, creating a 20-foot-radius area of difficult terrain. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rockfall
actions.description: The dragon causes a section of cliff or ceiling to collapse above a creature that it can see within 120 feet. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone and buried. A buried creature is restrained and must succeed on a DC 15 Athletics check to dig itself free.

actions.name: Stone Spikes
actions.description: The dragon chooses a 10-foot-square area on the ground that it can see within 120 feet. The ground turns to mud 3 feet deep. Each creature on the ground in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or sink and be restrained. A creature can use its action to try to free itself with a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check.

effects.name: Talking Animals
effects.description: Intelligent beings within 1 mile of the dragon's lair are prone to fits of giggling or uncontrollable laughter.

effects.name: Fool's Gold
effects.description: Small gems and veins of precious metal appear in rock formations within 6 miles of the lair, but they are illusory.

effects.name: Tunnels
effects.description: The land within 6 miles of the lair is riddled with natural tunnels and passages created by the dragon's burrowing.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

name: Arch-Hag

traits.name: Coven Magic
traits.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 19): *Augury*, *Find Familiar*, *Identify*, *Locate Object*, *Scrying*, or *Unseen Servant*. The hag must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the hag fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The hag has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spiteful Escape
traits.description: When the hag drops to 0 Hit Points, it dies only if it is within 30 feet of its anathema (a thing the DM chooses as the hag's most hated thing). Otherwise, the hag drops to 1 Hit Point and teleports to a harmless demiplane, and it can't return to the plane it left for 2d6 days. When the hag teleports away, each creature within 60 feet of the space it left is cursed. Until the curse ends, a creature has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws, and the hag knows its location anywhere in the multiverse.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hag makes two Spectral Claw attacks and uses Crackling Wave.

actions.name: Spectral Claw
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. or range 60 ft. *Hit:* 17 (3d6 + 7) Force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Crackling Wave
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 22, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* 32 (5d12) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* The target is cursed until the end of the hag's next turn. The target can't take Reactions until the curse ends.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 22):

bonusActions.name: Witch Strike
bonusActions.description: Each creature cursed by the hag and within 60 feet of it takes 14 (4d6) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Hag's Swipe
actions.description: The hag makes one Spectral Claw attack.

actions.name: Malicious Magic
actions.description: The hag uses Spellcasting to cast *Dimension Door* or *Hypnotic Pattern*. The hag can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

description: An arch-hag is the most powerful of hags, a cunning and ancient fey creature steeped in dark magic. They are manipulators and deal-makers of the highest order.

actions.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
actions.description: The arch-hag creates an illusory duplicate of herself within 60 feet. The duplicate lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round. A creature can discern the duplicate with a DC 16 Intelligence (Investigation) check.

actions.name: Hex
actions.description: A creature the arch-hag can see within 60 feet must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until initiative count 20 on the next round.

actions.name: Fey Curse
actions.description: The arch-hag targets a 20-foot-radius area within 120 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain until initiative count 20 on the next round.

effects.name: Twisted Nature
effects.description: Plants within 1 mile of the lair twist into thorny, unwholesome forms.

effects.name: Bewitched Beasts
effects.description: Beasts within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally aggressive and territorial.

effects.name: Eerie Sounds
effects.description: Eerie sounds echo within 1 mile of the lair, including cackles, whispers, and wailing.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the arch-hag dies, these effects fade over 1d10 days.

reactions.name: Tongue Twister
reactions.description: The hag casts *Counterspell* in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. If the target fails its saving throw, it is cursed until the end of its next turn. Until the curse ends, the target can't cast spells with a Verbal component, and when it speaks, it says the opposite of what it means.

name: Lich

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Spirit Jar
traits.description: If destroyed, the lich reforms in 1d10 days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the lich's lair.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The lich makes three attacks, using Eldritch Burst or Paralyzing Touch in any combination.

actions.name: Eldritch Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +12, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 31 (4d12 + 5) Force damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +12, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (3d6 + 5) Cold damage, and the target has the *Paralyzed* condition until the start of the lich's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The lich casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Detect Thoughts*, *Dispel Magic*, *Fireball* (level 5 version), *Invisibility*, *Lightning Bolt* (level 5 version), *Mage Hand*, *Prestidigitation*
**2/Day Each:** *Animate Dead*, *Dimension Door*, *Plane Shift*
**1/Day Each:** *Chain Lightning*, *Finger of Death*, *Power Word Kill*, *Scrying*

reactions.name: Protective Magic
reactions.description: The lich casts Counterspell or Shield in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Deathly Teleport
actions.description: The lich teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and each creature within 10 feet of the space it left takes 11 (2d10) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Disrupt Life
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 20, each creature that isn't an Undead in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the lich. Failure: 31 (9d6) Necrotic damage. Success: Half damage. The lich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Frightening Gaze
actions.description: The lich casts Fear, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. The lich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

description: A lich is a powerful spellcaster who has used dark magic to bind its soul to a phylactery, achieving a form of immortality. Liches are among the most feared of all undead, commanding vast magical power from beyond the grave.

actions.name: All-Seeing
actions.description: While in its lair, the lich can cast Clairvoyance, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as its Spellcasting action.

actions.name: Inevitable Siphon
actions.description: Whenever a Humanoid dies within 1 mile of the lair, its soul is immediately consumed by the lich. A Humanoid whose soul is consumed in this way can be brought back to life only by a True Resurrection or Wish spell.

name: Solar

traits.name: Divine Awareness
traits.description: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

traits.name: Exalted Restoration
traits.description: If the solar dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the solar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The solar has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The solar makes two Flying Sword attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Slaying Bow.

actions.name: Flying Sword
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +15, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d6 + 8) Slashing damage plus 36 (8d8) Radiant damage. *Hit or Miss:* The sword magically returns to the solar's hand or hovers within 5 feet of the solar immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Slaying Bow
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 21, one creature the solar can see within 600 feet. *Failure:* If the creature has 100 Hit Points or fewer, it dies. It otherwise takes 24 (4d8 + 6) Piercing damage plus 36 (8d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The solar casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 25):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*
**1/Day Each:** *Commune*, *Control Weather*, *Dispel Evil and Good*, *Resurrection*

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The solar casts *Cure Wounds* (level 2 version), *Lesser Restoration*, or *Remove Curse*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Blinding Gaze
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 25, one creature the solar can see within 120 feet. Failure: The target has the Blinded condition for 1 minute. The solar can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Radiant Teleport
actions.description: The solar teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the solar at its destination space. Failure: 11 (2d10) Radiant damage. Success: Half damage.

description: Angelic Protector of the Multiverse. Solars stand as the final line of defense between unspeakable evils and the order of the multiverse.

actions.name: Blinding Light
actions.description: Blinding light fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the solar can see within 120 feet. Each creature in the sphere must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Healing Word
actions.description: The solar restores 20 Hit Points to one creature it can see within 60 feet.

actions.name: Divine Judgment
actions.description: The solar targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Charisma saving throw or be stunned until initiative count 20 on the next round.

effects.name: Blessed Land
effects.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, evil creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

effects.name: Radiant Light
effects.description: Magical darkness can't be created within 1 mile of the lair.

effects.name: Peace
effects.description: Celestials within 1 mile of the lair have advantage on all saving throws.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the solar dies or leaves, these effects end immediately.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Repulsion Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast *Guiding Bolt* (level 2 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +16, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d8 + 9) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 23, each creature in a 120-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 82 (15d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Repulsion Breath
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 23, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target is pushed up to 60 feet straight away from the dragon and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 22, +14 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Guiding Bolt* (level 2 version), *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell), *Speak with Animals*, *Thaumaturgy*
**1/Day Each:** *Detect Thoughts*, *Control Water*, *Scrying*, *Water Breathing*

actions.name: Guiding Light
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Guiding Bolt* (level 2 version).

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Thunderclap
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 22, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 13 (3d8) Thunder damage, and the target has the Deafened condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Fog Cloud
actions.description: The dragon creates fog as if it had cast the Fog Cloud spell. The fog lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round.

actions.name: Thunderclap
actions.description: A thunderclap originates at a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. Each creature within a 20-foot radius must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (1d10) thunder damage and be deafened until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Tidal Wave
actions.description: A 10-foot-wide, 20-foot-long, 10-foot-tall wave of water crashes down on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

effects.name: Underwater Currents
effects.description: Once per day, the dragon can alter the weather in a 6-mile radius centered on its lair, as if it had cast the Control Weather spell.

effects.name: Safe Harbor
effects.description: Underwater plants within 6 miles of the lair take on dazzlingly brilliant hues.

effects.name: Sea Life
effects.description: Within its lair, the dragon can set illusory sounds, such as soft music and strange echoes, originating from a point it can perceive within 120 feet.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, changed weather reverts to normal, and other effects fade over 1d10 days.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Mind Spike* (level 5 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +15, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d8 + 8) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 22, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. *Failure:* 77 (22d6) Poison damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 21):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Mind Spike* (level 5 version)
**1/Day Each:** *Geas*, *Modify Memory*

actions.name: Mind Invasion
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Mind Spike* (level 5 version).

actions.name: Noxious Miasma
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 21, each creature in a 30-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 90 feet. *Failure:* 17 (5d6) Poison damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of its next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Grasping Roots
actions.description: Grasping roots and vines erupt in a 20-foot radius centered on a point on the ground the dragon can see within 120 feet. That area becomes difficult terrain, and each creature there must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be restrained by the roots and vines until the dragon uses this action again or dies.

actions.name: Charming Fog
actions.description: A wall of tangled brush bristling with thorns springs into existence on a solid surface within 120 feet. The wall is up to 60 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick, and it blocks line of sight. Each creature in the wall's space must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

actions.name: Magical Fog
actions.description: Magical fog billows around one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the dragon until initiative count 20 on the next round.

effects.name: Thickets
effects.description: Thickets form labyrinthine passages within 1 mile of the lair. The thickets act as 10-foot-high, 10-foot-thick walls that block line of sight.

effects.name: Plant Growth
effects.description: Within 1 mile of its lair, the dragon can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

effects.name: Mind Fog
effects.description: Rodents and birds within 1 mile of the lair serve as the dragon's eyes and ears.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, the thickets remain but are no longer considered difficult terrain, and other effects fade over 1d10 days.

name: Elemental Cataclysm

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The cataclysm can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the cataclysm doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the cataclysm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The cataclysm deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cataclysm makes two Elemental Burst attacks.

actions.name: Elemental Burst
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +15, reach 30 ft. or range 150 ft. Hit: 25 (5d6 + 8) damage of a type chosen by the cataclysm: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

actions.name: Cataclysmic Event
actions.description: The cataclysm creates one of the following effects at random (roll 1d4): 1: Clinging Flames (DEX DC 23, 60-ft Sphere, 45 (13d6) Fire, half on success, target starts burning); 2: Freezing Waves (STR DC 23, 90-ft Cone, 22 (5d8) Bludgeoning + 22 (5d8) Cold, Prone on fail, Speed 0 until end of next turn); 3: Raging Storm (60-ft Sphere, Blinded/Deafened, DEX DC 23, 18 (4d8) Lightning + 18 (4d8) Thunder); 4: Swallowing Earth (STR DC 23, 90-ft Cube, 18 (4d8) Bludgeoning + 18 (4d8) Acid, Prone and buried).

actions.name: Control Weather
actions.description: The cataclysm casts the Control Weather spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Eruption
actions.description: The cataclysm makes one Elemental Burst attack.

actions.name: Rumbling Movement
actions.description: The cataclysm moves up to its Speed, Fly Speed, or Swim Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. Each creature within 5 feet of the cataclysm as it moves is targeted once by the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 23. Failure: The target has the Prone condition. The cataclysm can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

description: The End and Beginning of Ages. Entities spawned from the raw forces of the multiverse and awash in dissonant elemental powers.

actions.name: Elemental Surge
actions.description: An elemental force erupts from a point the cataclysm can see within 120 feet. Choose fire, cold, lightning, or thunder. Each creature within 20 feet must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (4d6) damage of the chosen type.

actions.name: Elemental Shift
actions.description: The ground in a 30-foot radius around a point the cataclysm can see transforms: to lava (fire), ice (cold), crackling energy (lightning), or unstable earth (thunder). The area is difficult terrain and deals 7 (2d6) damage of the appropriate type to creatures starting their turn in it.

actions.name: Planar Rift
actions.description: A 10-foot-radius portal to an elemental plane opens at a point within 120 feet. Creatures within 15 feet must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pulled 10 feet toward the portal. A creature that enters the portal takes 21 (6d6) damage of a random elemental type.

effects.name: Elemental Storms
effects.description: Elemental storms of random types rage within 3 miles of the lair.

effects.name: Unstable Terrain
effects.description: The terrain within 1 mile of the lair shifts between elemental extremes  patches of fire, ice, crackling lightning, and trembling earth.

effects.name: Planar Bleed
effects.description: Minor portals to elemental planes occasionally open within 1 mile, releasing small elementals or elemental energy.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the elemental cataclysm is destroyed, these effects fade over 1d6 days.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Shatter* (level 3 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +16, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d8 + 9) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 23, each creature in a 120-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 88 (16d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 22):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Invisibility*, *Mage Hand*, *Shatter* (level 3 version)
**1/Day Each:** *Scrying*, *Sending*

actions.name: Cloaked Flight
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Invisibility* on itself, and it can fly up to half its Fly Speed. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Sonic Boom
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Shatter* (level 3 version). The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Tail Swipe
actions.description: The dragon makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Thunderclap
actions.description: Part of the ceiling in the lair collapses. Each creature within a 20-foot-radius of a point the dragon chooses within 120 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Sand Vortex
actions.description: A cloud of sand swirls about in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the dragon chooses within 120 feet. The cloud spreads around corners. Each creature in the cloud must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the blindness on a success.

actions.name: Lightning Arc
actions.description: Lightning arcs, forming a 5-foot-wide line between two points the dragon can see within 120 feet. Each creature in the line must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

effects.name: Thunderstorms
effects.description: Thunderstorms rage within 6 miles of the lair.

effects.name: Dust Devils
effects.description: Dust devils scour the land within 6 miles of the lair. A dust devil has the statistics of an air elemental, but it can't fly, has Intelligence and Charisma of 1, and doesn't have the Whirlwind action.

effects.name: Hidden Sinkholes
effects.description: Hidden sinkholes form in the lair's area. A creature on the ground that traverses the area must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check or sink 1d6 feet into the sinkhole.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, the dust devils disappear immediately, and thunderstorms abate within 1d10 days.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Paralyzing Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast *Ice Knife* (level 2 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +17, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 19 (2d8 + 10) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 24, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. *Failure:* 67 (15d8) Cold damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Breath
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 24, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. *First Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save. *Second Failure:* The target has the Paralyzed condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Hold Monster*, *Ice Knife* (level 2 version), *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Control Weather*, *Ice Storm* (level 7 version), *Teleport*, *Zone of Truth*

actions.name: Chill
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Hold Monster*. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Cold Gale
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 23, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Cold damage, and the target is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the dragon. *Success:* Half damage only. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Fog
actions.description: The dragon creates fog as though it had cast the Fog Cloud spell. The fog lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round.

actions.name: Icy Wind
actions.description: A blisteringly cold wind blasts through the lair. Each creature within 120 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (1d10) cold damage. Gases and vapors are dispersed, and unprotected flames are extinguished.

actions.name: Wall of Ice
actions.description: A wall of ice springs from a surface within 120 feet. The wall is 60 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick. Breaking through requires a DC 15 Strength check. A creature takes 10 (3d6) cold damage from touching the wall.

effects.name: Peaceful Aura
effects.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, winds buoy non-evil creatures that fall due to no act of the dragon or its allies. Such creatures descend at a rate of 60 feet per round and take no falling damage.

effects.name: Winter Weather
effects.description: Once per day, the dragon can alter the weather in a 6-mile radius, as if it had cast Control Weather.

effects.name: Safe Shelter
effects.description: Within its lair, the dragon can set illusory sounds, such as soft music and strange echoes.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, changed weather reverts to normal, and other effects fade over 1d10 days.

name: Blob of Annihilation

traits.name: Astral Implosion
traits.description: If the blob is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it implodes and ejects any creatures and objects engulfed by it into the Astral Sea. The blob itself vanishes, leaving behind a layer of slime on everything that was within 600 feet of it. In 1d20 years, the blob reconstitutes on a random world in the Material Plane.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the blob fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The blob has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The blob makes two Pseudopod attacks and uses Engulf. It can replace one attack with a use of Restraining Glob.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +15, reach 30 ft. *Hit:* 24 (3d10 + 8) Force damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: The blob moves up to its Speed and can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures and objects. *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 23, each creature or object whose space the blob enters for the first time during this move. *Failure:* The target is engulfed. While engulfed, a target has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the blob, and when the blob moves, the engulfed target moves with it. A nonmagical object is destroyed after spending 1 minute engulfed.

actions.name: Restraining Glob
actions.description: The blob lobs a slimy glob at one Large or smaller creature it can see within 600 feet of itself. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 23, the targeted creature. *Failure:* 18 (3d6 + 8) Acid damage. The glob rolls the target 60 feet straight toward the blob, and the target has the Restrained condition until the end of its next turn, when the glob harmlessly dissolves. *Success:* Half damage only.

description: A blob of annihilation is a sphere of magical darkness that utterly destroys any matter that contacts it. It drifts through the world, consuming everything in its path.

actions.name: Decay
actions.description: The blob deals 14 (4d6) Necrotic damage to each creature engulfed by it. The blob can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Grasping Glob
actions.description: The blob uses Restraining Glob. The blob can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Lashing Goop
actions.description: The blob makes one Pseudopod attack.

name: Empyrean

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the empyrean fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The empyrean has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The empyrean makes two attacks, using Sacred Weapon or Divine Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Sacred Weapon
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +17, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 31 (6d6 + 10) Force damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the start of the empyrean's next turn. The target can choose not to be Stunned, in which case it takes an extra 21 Force damage that bypasses Resistance or Immunity.

actions.name: Divine Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +15, range 600 ft. *Hit:* 35 (6d8 + 8) Necrotic or Radiant damage (empyrean's choice).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The empyrean casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23):
**At Will:** *Calm Emotions*, *Greater Restoration*, *Pass without Trace*, *Water Breathing*
**1/Day Each:** *Commune*, *Dispel Evil and Good*, *Plane Shift*

actions.name: Bolster
actions.description: The empyrean gains 10 Temporary Hit Points, and the empyrean and each ally within 30 feet of it gain Advantage on D20 Tests until the end of the empyrean's next turn. The empyrean can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Shockwave of Glory
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 23, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the empyrean. Failure: 27 (6d8) Force damage, and the target has the Prone condition. Success: Half damage only. The empyrean can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Smite
actions.description: The empyrean makes one Divine Ray attack.

description: Scions of the Gods. Empyreans are the spawn of deities, possessing divine influence and powers.

actions.name: Earthquake
actions.description: The empyrean creates a 30-foot-radius tremor centered on a point it can see within 150 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt
actions.description: The empyrean hurls a bolt of energy at a point it can see within 150 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of the point must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) radiant or necrotic damage (empyrean's choice).

actions.name: Summon Elemental
actions.description: The empyrean summons a water, earth, fire, or air elemental that appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet. The elemental acts on the empyrean's initiative and obeys its commands.

effects.name: Weather Control
effects.description: The empyrean can alter the weather in a 5-mile radius, as if it had cast Control Weather.

effects.name: Blessed Ground
effects.description: Flowers bloom and trees bear fruit in abundance within 1 mile of the lair.

effects.name: Emotional Aura
effects.description: Creatures within 1 mile of the lair feel strong emotions tied to the empyrean's mood  joy when it's happy, dread when it's angry.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the empyrean dies, these effects end over 1d10 days.

name: Kraken
languages: Understands Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, and Primordial but cannot speak

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The kraken can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the kraken fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The kraken makes two Tentacle attacks and uses Fling, Lightning Strike, or Swallow.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +17, reach 30 ft. *Hit:* 24 (4d6 + 10) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the *Grappled* condition (escape DC 20) from one of ten tentacles, and it has the *Restrained* condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Fling
actions.description: The kraken throws a Large creature Grappled by it to a space it can see within 60 feet of itself that isn't in the air. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 25, the creature thrown and each creature in the destination space. *Failure:* 18 (4d8) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the *Prone* condition. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Lightning Strike
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 23, one creature the kraken can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 33 (6d10) Lightning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 25, one creature Grappled by the kraken (it can have up to four creatures swallowed at a time). *Failure:* 23 (3d8 + 10) Piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is swallowed and no longer Grappled. A swallowed creature has the *Restrained* condition, has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and takes 24 (7d6) Acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Storm Bolt
actions.description: The kraken uses Lightning Strike.

actions.name: Toxic Ink
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 23, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the kraken while it is underwater. Failure: The target has the Blinded and Poisoned conditions until the end of the kraken's next turn. The kraken then moves up to its Speed. The kraken can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

description: Krakens are titanic sea monsters that lurk in the deepest ocean trenches. They are godlike in their power, capable of capsizing ships and dragging entire vessels beneath the waves.

effects.name: Ocean Tyrant
effects.description: The kraken exerts its dominance over animals in its domain. All Beasts within 1 mile of the lair have the Charmed condition while in that area.

effects.name: Sea and Storms
effects.description: While in its lair, the kraken can cast Control Weather, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the kraken dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Spellcasting to cast *Guiding Bolt* (level 4 version) or (B) Weakening Breath.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +17, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 19 (2d8 + 10) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 24, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. *Failure:* 71 (13d10) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 24):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Guiding Bolt* (level 4 version), *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Flame Strike* (level 6 version), *Word of Recall*, *Zone of Truth*

actions.name: Weakening Breath
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 24, each creature that isn't currently affected by this breath in a 90-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Tests and subtracts 5 (1d10) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Banish
actions.description: *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 24, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 24 (7d6) Force damage, and the target has the Incapacitated condition and is transported to a harmless demiplane until the start of the dragon's next turn, at which point it reappears in an unoccupied space of the dragon's choice within 120 feet of the dragon. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Guiding Light
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Guiding Bolt* (level 4 version).

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Banishment
actions.description: The dragon glimpses the future, so it has advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until initiative count 20 on the next round.

actions.name: Lava Burst
actions.description: One creature the dragon can see within 120 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be banished to a dream plane, a different plane of existence the dragon has visited. To escape, the creature must use its action to make a DC 15 Charisma check. On a success, the creature escapes the dream plane.

actions.name: Healing Aura
actions.description: The dragon creates a shimmering wall of golden light. The wall is 40 feet long, 10 feet high, and 1 foot thick and appears in a space the dragon can see within 120 feet. Nonmagical flames in the wall's space are extinguished. A creature that enters the wall for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

effects.name: Gentle Mist
effects.description: Whenever a creature that can understand a language sleeps or enters a state of trance or reverie within 6 miles of the lair, the dragon can establish telepathic contact with that creature and converse.

effects.name: Precious Gems
effects.description: Banks of beautiful, opalescent mist manifest within 6 miles of the lair. The mist doesn't obscure anything. It takes eerie shapes when evil creatures are near the dragon or its allies.

effects.name: Luck
effects.description: Gems and pearls within 1 mile of the lair sparkle and gleam, shedding dim light in a 5-foot radius.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies, these effects end immediately.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Scorching Ray* (level 3 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +17, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 19 (2d8 + 10) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 24, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. *Failure:* 91 (26d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Command* (level 2 version), *Detect Magic*, *Scorching Ray* (level 3 version)
**1/Day:** *Fireball* (level 6 version), *Scrying*

actions.name: Commanding Presence
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast Command (level 2 version). The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Fiery Rays
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast Scorching Ray (level 3 version). The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

effects.name: Burning Heat
effects.description: The area within 1 mile of the lair is an area of extreme heat. A burning creature or object takes an additional 1d4 Fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

effects.name: Smoldering Haze
effects.description: The area within 1 mile of the lair is Lightly Obscured with clouds of ash. Whenever a creature other than the dragon or one of its allies finishes a Long Rest in that area, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

name: Colossus
languages: Understands Celestial and Common but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The colossus makes three attacks, using Slam or Radiant Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +18, reach 20 ft. *Hit:* 32 (4d10 + 10) Bludgeoning damage, and the colossus pushes the target up to 20 feet straight away from itself.

actions.name: Radiant Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +18, range 300 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d10) Radiant damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Divine Beam
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 26, each creature in a 300-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 65 (10d12) Radiant damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this beam disintegrates into dust, leaving behind any magic items it was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The colossus can't shape-shift.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the colossus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The colossus has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Smite
actions.description: The colossus makes one Radiant Ray attack.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.description: The colossus moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it can make one Slam attack at any point during that move.

name: Tarrasque

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
traits.description: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The tarrasque has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Reflective Carapace
traits.description: If the tarrasque is targeted by a Magic Missile spell or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll 1d6. On a 1-5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected and reflects the spell, turning the caster into the target.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The tarrasque makes one Bite attack and three other attacks, using Claw or Tail in any combination.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +19, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 36 (4d12 + 10) Piercing damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 20). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Restrained condition and can't teleport.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +19, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 28 (4d8 + 10) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +19, reach 30 ft. *Hit:* 23 (3d8 + 10) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Thunderous Bellow
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 27, each creature and each object that isn't being worn or carried in a 150-foot Cone. *Failure:* 78 (12d12) Thunder damage, and the target has the Deafened and Frightened conditions until the end of its next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Onslaught
actions.description: The tarrasque moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Claw or Tail attack.

actions.name: World-Shaking Movement
actions.description: The tarrasque moves up to its Speed. At the end of this movement, the tarrasque creates an instantaneous shock wave in a 60-foot Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area lose Concentration and, if Medium or smaller, have the Prone condition. The tarrasque can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

description: The tarrasque is the most feared monstrosity in existence -- a titan of destruction that rises periodically to consume everything in its path before returning to a dormant slumber deep underground.

bonusActions.name: Swallow
bonusActions.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 27, one Large or smaller creature Grappled by the tarrasque (it can have up to six creatures swallowed at a time). Failure: The target is swallowed, and the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the Blinded and Restrained conditions and can't teleport, it has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 (16d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns. If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque and has the Prone condition. If the tarrasque dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 20 feet of movement, exiting Prone.
